item.title: Apprentice's Wand
item.fluff: This simple length of wood appears in your hand when you need it most

block.name: Property
block.line: You can attune this wand to yourself during a short rest. It can be attuned to only one person at a time, and attuning it to one person breaks the attunement to the previous person.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementThis wand must be attuned to you.
EffectThe wand is transported to your hand from anywhere on the same plane.
SpecialYou can use this power even when the wand is not in your possession.

item.title: Architect's Staff
item.fluff: Stylized architectural and elemental motifs adorn this staff that helps control spells that create barriers or change terrain

block.name: Propertis
block.line: This staff has the following properties:
When you create a Zone with a power using this staff, choose a number of squares adjacent to the zone equal to this staff's enhancement bonus. The chosen squares are also part of the zone.
When you use a power that has a wall area using this staff, increase the length of the wall by this staff's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectRanged special (one effect with a wall area you have created); You recreate the target wall effect. The old and new shape must share at least one square.

item.title: Astral Redoubt Totem
item.fluff: Each string of this deam-catcher totem records a journey across the Astral Sea, including a refuge along the path

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with an attack using this totem, you regain a number of hit points equal to twice this totem's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a primal attack using this totem
EffectClose burst 5 (one ally); The target regains a number of hit points equal to three times this totem's enhancement bonus.
You can choose to transport the target to a place of safety in the Astral Sea until the start of his or her next turn. While in the safe place, the target is removed from play.

item.title: Autumn Harvest Totem
item.fluff: This totem is fashioned from leaves and bone shards to embody the spirit of autumn and the inevitability of death

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a bloodied creature

block.name: Property
block.line: Your attacks using this totem deal +2 additional damage against bloodied creatures.
Level 12 or 17+5 additional damage.
Level 22 or 27+8 additional damage.

item.title: Avenging Ash Totem
item.fluff: The ashes staining the totem remind you of civilization's ravages against nature

block.name: Property
block.line: Your primal attacks using this totem deal +2 additional damage against contructs and objects.
Level 12 or 17+5 additional damage.
Level 22 or 27+8 additional damage.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this totem
EffectThe triggering enemy takes 5 additional fire damage. If the triggering attack is a primal attack and the triggering enemy is a construct, the enemy also takes ongoing 5 fire damage.
Level 12 or 1710 additional fire damage; ongoing 10 fire damage.
Level 22 or 2720 additional fire damage; ongoing 15 fire damage.

item.title: Aversion Staff
item.fluff: While you wield this staff, any foe afflicted by your powers is reluctant to attack you

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses against attacks from enemies that are subject to effects you caused using this staff or that are in zones you created using this staff.

item.title: Balance Totem
item.fluff: Reflecting the balance between civilization and the wilderness, half of this totem is carved with runes, and the other half is unshaped except by nature

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a primal implement power using this implement

EffectClose burst 10 (an ally adjacent to either you or the triggering enemy); The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value, and regains additional hit points equal to twice this totem's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Battle Staff
item.fluff: This steel-shod staff is useful for staff wielders who prefer to get into the thick of battle

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage, or +1d8 damage when making a melee attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make a Weapon attack using this staff, you score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou miss a melee attack using this staff
EffectYou reroll the triggering attack roll and use the second result, even if it is lower.

item.title: Beacon of Erathis
item.fluff: Taking the form of a cog alight with the flame of hope, this holy symbol brings light to the darkness

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectThe symbol sheds bright light in a 20-square radius, or stops shedding light.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Fire or Radiant attack using this symbol
EffectThe triggering creature is wrapped in a glowing halo (save ends).
While in the halo, the target sheds bright light in a 20-square radius and grants combat advantage.

item.title: Belled Branch
item.fluff: this silver tree branch, strung with tiny golden bells, hangs from a simple chain and allows safe prayer in the heat of battle

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +4 item bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by using a ranged or area divine power with this implement.

item.title: Blast Scepter
item.fluff: This rare, ancient device is one of the more unpleasant legacies of lost Netheril
item.headline: force

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 fire and resist 5 lightning.
Level 12 or 17Resist 10 fire and resist 10 lightning.
Level 22 or 27Resist 15 fire and resist 15 lightning.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackClose wave 3 (each creature in the wave); [Intelligence, Constitution, or Charisma] vs. Reflex
HitYour [Intelligence, Consitution, or Charisma] modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus thunder damage, and you push the target up to 3 squares.
Level 12 or 172 + your [Intelligence, Constitution, or Charisma] modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus thunder damage.
Level 22 or 274 + your [Intelligence, Constitution, or Charisma] modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus thunder damage, and push up to 4 squares.

item.title: Blazing Arc Ki Focus
item.fluff: When you grasp this white rock and focus on its power by enduring the charring heat within it, you mold your ki into a thing of fire

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a melee attack using this ki focus
EffectThe triggering attack deals fire damage instead of any other damage type, gains the Fire keyword, and loses any other damage type keywords.

item.title: Bloodcurse Rod
item.fluff: This rod empowers its wielder to use his pact boon more often

block.name: Property
block.line: You can trigger your Pact Boon when you bloody a creature under your curse with an attack using this rod. This does not stop you from triggering it normally.

item.title: Bloodhunter Implement
item.fluff: This implement is carved from a petrified heart, and it beats when it is close to wounded prey
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a bloodied target

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against bloodied targets with attacks using this implement.

item.title: Bloodthirsty Ki Focus
item.fluff: This stone in the shape of a five-pointed star has lines upon lines of shadow magic teachings in a dark brown ink that looks like dried blood

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a bloodied target

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to damage rolls against bloodied targets.
Level 14 or 19+5 item bonus
Level 24 or 29+8 item bonus

item.title: Blurred Strikes Ki Focus
item.fluff: You can master the secret of speed by catching this small mechanical fly in your hand

block.name: Property
block.line: You can use your Flurry of Blows power a second time during your turn, but both uses must by triggered by different attacks using this ki focus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerDuring your turn, you move a total number of squares equal to at least one-half your speed
EffectYou gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Boar's Charge Totem
item.fluff: When you grasp this boar's tusk, your heart races with feral excitement and you throw yourself headling into battle

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus on a charge attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When charging while you are in beast form, you gain a +1 item bonus to speed.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a charge attack using this totem while you are in beast form
EffectYou push the triggering enemy 1 square and can shift into the space vacated.
Level 23 or 28Push 2 squares.

item.title: Body of Fire Ki Focus
item.fluff: This oil fuels a fire within you that might smolder or might blaze forth, but will never be extinguished

block.name: Property
block.line: All damage dealt by attacks using this ki focus is fire damage, and the attacks gain the Fire keyword, unless the attack already has a damage type.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, you have resist 5 fire and vulnerable 5 cold.
Level 14 or 19Resist 10 and vulnerable 10.
Level 24 or 29Resist 15 and vulnerable 15.
While you have the resist, if a creature starts its turn grabbing you or being grabbed by you, it takes fire damage equal to your resist fire.

item.title: Book of Knowledge
item.fluff: This book contains many more secrets that can physically fit on its pages

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Knowledge checks and monster knowledge checks

item.title: Book of Undeniable Fire
item.fluff: The pages of this tome have scorch marks along the edges
item.headline: fire

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make a Fire attack using this tome, you treat any resist fire the target might have as being 5 lower.
Level 15 or 20As being 10 lower.
Level 25 or 30As being 15 lower.

item.title: Bright Jewel
item.fluff: When you focus your mind, this jewel on a silver chain bloows with bright light

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d4 damage per plus, or +1d6 radiant damage per plus if you worship a deity of the Light domain

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: RequirementYou must worship a deity of the Light domain.
TriggerYou score a critical hit against an enemy with a Radiant attack using this holy symbol
EffectThe triggering enemy is stunned until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Cascading Strikes Ki Focus
item.fluff: Your wide strike triggers this stout stone idol to release its power, helping you land a blow that would otherwise go astray

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou miss with an attack using this ki focus
EffectYou reroll the triggering attack roll, using the second result even if it is lower.

item.title: Certainty of Death Ki Focus
item.fluff: You gaze at the statuette with a hole where its heart should be and look into yourself, focusing your ki on the void of life within it

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou use your dark reaping racial power
EffectYou gain combat advantage until the end of your next turn against one creature adjacent to the creature that triggered your dark reaping.

item.title: Chaos Shard Implement
item.fluff: This glowing clump of blue crystal can be fitted to a rod, staff, or wand, allowing its user to channel the power of the Far Realm to smite enemies
item.headline: psychic

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to damage rolls with arcane Psychic powers using this implement.
Level 15 or 20+5 item bonus.
Level 25 or 30+8 item bonus.
Whenever you gain this item bonus, you also gain vulnerable 5 psychic until the start of your next turn.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an arcane Psychic power
EffectThe triggering attack deals 1d10 additional psychic damage to the triggering enemy.
Level 15 or 202d10 additional psychic damage.
Level 25 or 303d10 additional psychic damage.

item.title: Chronicles of the Dawn War
item.fluff: An exhaustive record of the Dawn War's triumphs and defeats await those who examine these pages

block.name: Properties
block.line: The implement has the following two properties:
You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls against elementsl with attacks using this implement.
When you bloody an elemental creature with an attack using this implement, the elemental creature takes extra radiant damage equal to twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Cobra Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: This clay serpent drips with a strange venom - by pressing your finger into its fangs, you unlock the serpents's mysteries

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against Poison effects.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee attack using this ki focus
EffectThe triggering enemy also takes ongoing poison damage (save ends). The ongoing damage equals 2 + your Strength modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
Level 12 or 17The ongoing damage equals 5 + your Strength modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
Level 22 or 27The ongoing damage equals 10 + your Strength modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

item.title: Cold Fury Ki Focus
item.fluff: The angrier you get, the colder this blue steel medallion becomes

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your second wind, your attacks using this ki focus deal extra cold damage until the end of your next turn. The extra damage equals this ki focus's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an adjacent enemy with an attack using this ki focus
EffectThe triggering enemy is immobilized until it takes damage from an attack, until uses a standard action to end this effect, or until the end of the encounter, whichever comes first.
If the target takes damage before the end of your next turn, it takes extra cold damage equal to 2 + twice this ki focus's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Crimson Wick Ki Focus
item.fluff: This braided wick burns brightly when placed within an oil lamp and ignited, yet is unconsumed by the flame while also inspiring you to use your own inner resources to best effect

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 necrotic per plus if you expended a healing surge this turn

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou expend a healing surge to gain a power bonus to damage rolls using this ki focus. The bonus lasts until the end of your next turn, and equals twice this ki focus's enhancement bonus + twice the number of times you have used this power in the day.

item.title: Dark Hunger Ki Focus
item.fluff: As you study the intricate runes carved into the surface of this dire wolf fang, you can feel the savage beast begin to stir within you

block.name: Property
block.line: When you trigger your blood drinker Vampire attack power with an attack made with this ki focus, you can reroll any damage die that displays a 1 or 2 until the result is higher.

item.title: Darkspiral Rod
item.fluff: The dark energy spiral that exemplifies your devotion tot he dark pact coalesces into a black cloud around this rod

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 necrotic and psychic damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain an item bonus to damage rolls against targets under your curse. The bonus equals the strength of your dark energy spiral.

item.title: Death Fang Implement
item.fluff: A wounded or vulnerable foe grants you advantage while you wield this implement of bone, teeth, and sinew

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against a target granting combat advantage to you

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou bloody an enemy with an attack using this implement
EffectThe triggering enemy grants combat advantage to you (save ends).

item.title: Death Shroud Ki Focus
item.fluff: These winding sheets for the dead appear to be woven with veins of blood, and as you stude their shining trairls, you focus on your ability to ready foes for the grave

block.name: Property
block.line: You deal additiona critical damage against a target that has your shrouds on it. The additional damage equals +1d6 for each shroud on the target or that you invoked on the attack.
Level 14 or 19+1d8 extra critical damage per shroud.
Level 24 or 29+1d10 extra critical damage per shroud.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this ki focus
EffectYou use your assassin shroud class power against the triggering enemy. This does not count towards your limit of being able to use the power once per turn.

item.title: Death Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: As you work the gray soil contained in this small wooden box into your hands, you focus your ki on matters of the grave

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a melee attack using this ki focus
EffectThe triggering attack deals necrotic damage instead of any other damage type, gains the Necrotic keyword, and loses any other damage type keywords.

item.title: Defensive Staff
item.fluff: This staff increases your resistance to all types of attacks

headline.name: Critical:
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you have the Staff of Defense class feature

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will defenses.
If you have the Staff of Defense class feature, you also gain a +1 item bonus to AC.

item.title: Devastating Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small triangular slab appears to be made of some deep green stone, mottled with fecks of black and covered in runed etching, and it fits in one hand but seems far heavier than it should

block.name: Property
block.line: When you roll damage for an attack made using this ki focus, any die that shows a 1 instead deals 2 damage. This increases to a die that shows a 1 or 2 dealing 3 damage for d8s, d10s or d10s.

item.title: Dispelling Tome
item.fluff: This thin tome helps you unbind magical creations

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use dispel magic using this tome, you can target two effects instead of one and you gain a +2 item bonus to your attack roll.

item.title: Earthfall Totem
item.fluff: Attacks with this rough-hewn stone tomem pack a powerful punch

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make a primal attack using this totem, you deal +2 damage to each target you push, slide, or knock prone. The damage is doubled if you cannot push or slide the target the full distance because of blocking terrain.
Level 12 or 17+4 additional damage.
Level 22 or 27+6 additional damage.

item.title: Earthroot Staff
item.fluff: This staff is as light as wood, but it seems to be made of earth and stone with a fine crystal atop it, and it can bind your enemies to the earth and protect you against them

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or the target is restrained until the end of your next turn

block.name: Property
block.line: Any target you immobilize, petrify, slow, or restrain with a power using this staff takes a -2 penalty to the first saving throw it makes against that condition.

item.title: Emerald Flame Ki Focus
item.fluff: A flickering, yellow flame dances within this green gem's facets, hinting at the magic that can be unleashed only by one with the focus needed to study the flame's secrets

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou are hit by an attack
EffectClose burst 1 (each enemy in burst); Each target takes 5 fire damage. You then shift 2 squares.
Level 12 or 1710 fire damage.
Level 22 or 2715 fire damage.

item.title: Enduring Implement
item.fluff: Holding this implement allows you to endure suffering to accomplish your goals

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus while bloodied

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are bloodied during an encounter
EffectYou gain a power bonus to Implement damage rolls using this implement until the end of your next turn. The bonus equals your Constitution modifier.
Level 13 or 18Equals 2 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 23 or 28Equals 4 + your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Enduring Hatred Implement
item.fluff: A broken holy symbol represents a long-standing grudge against heaven's immortals

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against an immortal creature

block.name: Property
block.line: Any enemy you bloody with an attack using this implement takes a -1 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Level 13 or 18-2 penalty.
Level 23 or 28-3 penalty.

item.title: Envenomed Ki Focus
item.fluff: This item looks like a bracelet made of green-tinted steel in the shape of a thorny vine with the surface etched with magical teachings that fill your ki with venom
item.headline: Poison

item.title: Evasive Offense Ki Focus
item.fluff: As you practice with this blunt short sword, you mystically learn new defensive techniques

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against an enemy that has made an attack against you during the current turn

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to AC against reactive strikes.

block.name: Attack Bonus
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits you with a reactive strike
EffectYou use your Flurry of Blows power. This use does not count against the limit of using it once per turn, and you must include the triggering enemy as a target.

item.title: Fell Beast Totem
item.fluff: This totem is infused with venom extracted from corrupted predators of the swamp

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectThe first time you hit with a primal attack using this totem during your current turn, each creature you hit takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
Level 13 or 18Ongoing 10 poison damage.
Level 23 or 28Ongoing 15 poison damage.

item.title: Feyswarm Staff
item.fluff: This staff seems to have burrowing insects moving under its surface, which it can unleash when used to attack

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with an attack using this staff, you conjure stinging insects in the target's space until the end of your next turn. The insects move with the target, remaining in its space.
While the insects are in the target's space, the target is dazed.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this staff
EffectYou conjure stinging insects in the triggering enemy's space until the end of your next turn. The insects move with the enemy, remaining in its space.
While the insects are in the target's space, the target is dazed.

item.title: Final Sleep Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small manual's plain, black leather covers contain illustrations of the vulnerable points on a variety of creatures, the contents changing each time you open the book

block.name: Property
block.line: When you reduce an enemy to 5 hit points or fewer with an attack using this ki focus, you instead reduce it to 0 hit points.
Level 13 or 18To 10 hit points or fewer.
Level 23 or 28To 15 hit points or fewer.

item.title: Fireblood Ki Focus
item.fluff: Gripping this burned and pitted scrap of steel that might have once been a dagger or shoulder plate fills you with inexplicable anger
item.headline: acid and fire

block.name: Property
block.line: When you take acid damage or fire damage, you gain a +2 item bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou bloody an enemy with an attack using this ki focus
EffectThe triggering enemy takes ongoing acid and fire damage (save ends). The ongoing damage equals 3 + twice this ki focus' enhancement bonus.

item.title: Flame Wand
item.fluff: Small flames become conflagrations when channeled through this wand
item.headline: Fire

block.name: Scorching Burst
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in the burst); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit 1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
Level 23 or 282d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
EffectThe area becomes a zone of flames until the start of your next turn.
A creature that ends its turn in the zone takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 183 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.
Level 23 or 286 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.

item.title: Flesh-Eating Rod
item.fluff: This blacked iron rod is carved with horrid demons cavorting and killing all along its length

block.name: Critical
block.line: the target takes ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Level 12Ongoing 15 acid damage.
Level 17Ongoing 20 acid damage.
Level 22Ongoing 25 acid damage.
Level 27Ongoing 30 acid damage.

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you deal ongoing damage to an enemy with an attack using this rod, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to savings throws to end the ongoing damage. If the ongoing damage is part of an effect, this penalty can result in the target succeeding at its save to end the other parts of the effect but fail at ending the ongoing damage.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an Implement attack using this rod

EffectReduce the damage he triggering enemy takes from the triggering attack by 5. This can reduce the damage the triggering enemy takes to 0, but doing so does not negate any effects the attack normally has when it deals damage.
Level 12 or 17Reduce by 10.
Level 22 or 27Reduce by 15.

The triggering enemy takes ongoing 5 acid damage (save ends). If the triggering attack dealt less damage than you reduced it by, the ongoing damage instead equals the damage the triggering attack would have dealt.
Level 12 or 17Ongoing 10 acid damage.
Level 22 or 27Ongoing 15 acid damage.
Each time the target takes this ongoing damage, you can slide it 1 square as a free interrupt.

item.title: Force Staff
item.fluff: Use this staff to knock down your enemies and drag them across the ground

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 force damage per plus, or the target is knocked prone

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with a Force attack, you both deal the additional critical damage and knock the target prone.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with a Force power using this staff
EffectYou slide the target a number of squares equal to this staff's enchancement bonus.

item.title: Force Wand
item.fluff: With this wand, your force powers pack a bigger punch

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with Force powers using this wand, and the damage dealt by the magic missile wizard at-will attack

block.name: Magic Missile
block.line: EffectRanged 20 (one creature); 4 + your Intelligence modifier force damge.
Level 86 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 139 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 1811 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 2315 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 2817 + your Intelligence modifier force damage.

item.title: Four Winds Ki Focus
item.fluff: Channeling the power of air and sky, you command the four winds to speed your strikes and whisk you to safety

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and you slide the target 1 square per plus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee attack using this ki focus
EffectYou fly a number of squares equal 1 + this ki focus's enhancement bonus. This counts as shifting. You must land at the end of this movement or you fall.

item.title: Frost Wand
item.fluff: Frost covers the tip of this wand, threatening to unleash its icy chill
item.headline: Cold

block.name: Ray of Frost
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
Level 23 or 282d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
EffectThe target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Ghost Mask Ki Focus
item.fluff: You focus your ki to grasp this immaterial terror mask and, when you hold its transparent and horrific visage to your own face, it vanishes within you, ready to emerge at your call

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an attack that targets AC using this ki focus

EffectThe triggering attack gains the Psychic keyword, targets Will instead of AC, and all damage dealt by the attack is psychic damage instead. The attack loses any other damage type keywords it has.

item.title: Ghost Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: This white orb seems little more than a worthless bauble, but when you focus on it, you see paths where the dead walk

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you make a melee attack using this ki focus against an insubstantial creature granting combat advantage to you, that attack ignores the insubstantial quality.

item.title: Harvester's Staff
item.fluff: This bone staff converts the life energy of your comrades into psionic energy
item.headline: necrotic
Item BonusIntimidate checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee 1 (one ally adjacent to tyou); The target loses a healing surge, and you regain 2 power points.
Level 15 or 20Regain 4 power points.
Level 25 or 30Regain 6 power points.

item.title: Hawk's Talon Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small, blunt dagger is made of soft, malleable metal, and shivers and flutters in your grasp, like a captive bird, and unlocks the secret of the swooping hawk's tactics

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus when you charge

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you charge, you gain an item bonus to Athletics to jump as part of the movement. The item bonus equals twice this ki focus' enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectYou charge an enemy. During the movement part, you gain your choice of one of the following two benefits:
You shift your speed instead of move your speed.
You fly your speed instead of move your speed, but you cannot gain height and must land before you make the attack.
You can make an at-will melee attack that targets only one target instead of making a melee basic attack.

item.title: Hellfire Staff
item.fluff: This imposing staff of flame and bone burns the flesh and soul of your enemies

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: You immediately regain the use of an encounter power with the Fire or Fear keyword

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectThe staff sheds bright light in a 5-square radius, and dim light for a further 2 squares.
Also, melee and close attacks made with this staff deal fire damage instead of their normal damage, and have the Fire keyword instead of any other damage type keyword.
You can end this effect as a free action.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this staff
EffectThe triggering enemy takes +1d8 additional fire damage, and you push it up to 3 squares.
Level 14 or 19+2d8 additional fire damage.
Level 24 or 29+3d8 additional fire damage, and push up to 4 squares.

item.title: Hellfire Wand
item.fluff: Your fires burn with the fury of the Nine Hells when wielding this wand

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire damage per plus, or +1d8 fire damage per plus with Fire powers

item.headline: Fire

block.name: Hellish Rebuke
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Level 23 or 282d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
EffectEach time you take damage before the end of your next turn, the target takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 184 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.
Level 23 or 288 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus fire damage.

item.title: Hexer's Rod
item.fluff: Crafted in ancient times by goblin shamans, this rod channels their tricky, underhanded magic

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this rod
EffectYou can use the following action once before the end of the encounter, with the triggering enemy as the target:
Immediate Reaction: Trigger: The target misses you with an attack; You shift 2 squares and gain concealment against the target until the start of its next turn.
Level 13 or 18Shift 3 squares.
Level 23 or 28Shift 4 squares.

item.title: Hungry Spirits Totem
item.fluff: The appearance of this totem changes week by week, depending on which spirits are hungriest

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with Spirit attacks

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this totem, you can move your spirit companion to a space adjacent ot the target as a free reaction.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy adjacent to your spirit companion with a primal attack using this totem
EffectYou and one ally within 2 squares of your spirit companion can spend a healing surge to regain hit points. Each target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

item.title: Hunting Panther Ki Focus
item.fluff: These mummified eyeballs tucked inside a worn wooden box see through your enemy's deceptions

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a target that has cover or concealment

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this focus
EffectThe target cannot benefit from concealment or cover until it hits you with an attack or until the end of the encounter, whichever comes first.

item.title: Hurricane Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: As power swirls within this slender glass cylinder, your fast strikes knock your enemies back

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this ki focus, you can push the target 1 square. If the attack already pushes, pulls, or slides, increase the maximum distance of that forced movement by 1 square instead.
Level 14 or 19Push up to 2 squares, or increase forced movement by 2 squares.
Level 24 or 29Push up to 3 squares, or increase forced movement by 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou use your Flurry of Blows power
EffectYour Flurry of Blows deals additional damage equal to this ki focus' enhancement bonus, and you can push each target a number of squars equal to this ki focus' enhancement bonus.

item.title: Impeding Ki Focus
item.fluff: This jade figurine serves as a convenient target dummy, allowing you to focus your ki on making the most of a foe's vulnerabilities

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, you can roll twice and use the higher result if the target is dazed or stunned

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls using this ki focus with melee attacks against dazed or stunned enemies.
Level 13 or 18+4 bonus to damage rolls.
Level 23 or 28+6 bonus to damage rolls.
You gain one-half the bonus with your Flurry of Blows power.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use your Flurry of Blows class power
EffectDuring your current turn, each bloodied enemy you damage with your Flurry of Blows cannot regain hit points until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Implement of Brawn
item.fluff: Physical strength and devotion are both enhanced by this adamantine implement

block.name: Special
block.line: When created, this implement is focused on a specific power source: divine for a holy symbol, or psionic or shadow for a ki focus (creator's choice).
The enchant item ritual can be used to change this choice, with a component cost of 70 gp.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with an Implement attack power of the focused power source using this implement
EffectYou make a melee basic attack.
If this attack hits a creature marked by you, it deals +1d10 additional damage.
Level 13 or 18+2d10 additional damage.
Level 23 or 28+3d10 additional damage.

item.title: Implement of the Canny Liar
item.fluff: This smoky gray orb enhances your ability to bluff, making your foe more vulnerable to sudden attacks
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus
Item BonusBluff checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this implement
EffectThe triggering enemy grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
2The triggering enemy is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Implement of Command
item.fluff: This staff is a useful tool for imposing your will on others
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus
Item BonusDiplomacy checks

block.name: Attack power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a target with a Charm attack using this implement
EffectYou slide the triggering enemy up a number of squares equal to this implement's enhancement bonus, and it grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Implement of the Deft Negotiator
item.fluff: This implement emits feelings of calm and goodwill, and can make your enemies willing to attack those you choose
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus
Item BonusDiplomacy checks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this implement
EffectThe triggering enemy makes a melee basic attack as a free interrupt against a creature of your choice that is adjacent to the triggering enemy.
2The triggering enemy gains a +4 power bonus to the attack roll, and a power bonus to the damage roll equal two twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Destructive Power
item.fluff: This implement helps make your attacks even more destructive

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectThe first attack using this implement you make before the end of your current turn deals an additional +1d10 damage.
Level 15 or 20Additional +2d10 damage.
Level 25 or 30Additional +3d10 damage.

item.title: Implement of Distant Shielding
item.fluff: With a word, you ward an ally against a foe's attack, promising swift retribution if harm comes to your companion
item.headline: radiant

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be a member of a divine class.
EffectRanged 10 (one ally); The target is covered in shielding radiant energy until the end of the encounter.
The first time an ally attacks the target while it is shielded, that enemy takes 10 radiant damage.
Level 12 or 1715 radiant damage.
Level 22 or 2720 radiant damage.

item.title: Implement of Divinity
item.fluff: This delicate silver implement lets you channel your deity's power back to yourself

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with a divine attack using this implement
EffectYou can use an additional Channel Divinity power during this encounter. You do not regain any expended Channel Divinity power.
Level 17, 22, 27: You regain any expended Channel Divinity powers.

item.title: Implement of Dread
item.fluff: This dreadful implement was used in Bael Turath to maintain order among slaves
item.headline: psychic

block.name: Critical
block.line: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an Implement attack using this implement
EffectThe attack gains the Fear keyword, and the following effect entry:
EffectEach target enemy grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Implement of Earthen Might
item.fluff: This implement channels the power of the earth to add strength to your limbs and weight to your blows

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target is knocked prone

block.name: Property
block.line: When you are standing on a surface of stone or earth, you gain an item bonus to Athletics checks and Strength ability checks (but not Strength-based attack rolls). The item bonus equals this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power

line.i: For your target, the weight of the world suddenly feels like it tripled

block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with an attack using this implement
EffectThe triggering creature is slowed (save ends).

item.title: Implement of Fear
item.fluff: The only thing more unnerving than holding this pale implement is experiencing its horrific effects

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with Fear powers

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with a Fear power using this implement, and that power normally deals no damage, you can choose to deal 1d4 psychic damage per plus to the target of that attack. You cannot add any modifiers to this damage rolls. This is resolved as a separate effect after the attack has been resolved.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a target with an attack using this implement
EffectYou push the triggering target up to a number of squares equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Fickle Fate
item.fluff: Light and shadow swirl along this implement as you bestow its boon upon an ally and its curse upon an enemy
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 10 (one enemy in the burst and one ally in the burst); The target enemy takes a -2 penalty to saving throws (save ends). While the enemy has this penalty, the target ally gains a +2 power bonus to saving throws.
Level 14 or 19-3 penalty and a +3 power bonus.
Level 24 or 29-5 penalty and a +5 power bonus.

item.title: Implement of Forceful Rebuking
item.fluff: Your foes can't resist the power of this crysta-capped implement when you forcibly move them
item.headline: Critical+1d6 force damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: When you push, pull, or slide a creature with a power using this implement, you can increase the maximum distance by 1 square.
Level 14 or 19By 2 squares.
Level 24 or 29By 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Force attack using this implement
EffectYou knock the triggering enemy prone.

item.title: Implement of Harmonic Agony
item.fluff: When tapped, this implement rings with a clear bass tone, combining with your thunder attacks to rattle an enemy's senses
item.headline: Critical+1d6 thunder damage per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Thunder power
EffectThe triggering enemy is deafened until the end of the encounter, and takes ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).
Level 14 or 19Ongoing 10 thunder damage.
Level 24 or 29Ongoing 15 thunder damage.

item.title: Implement of the Hunting Hound
item.fluff: This plain, wooden implement has a carving of a snarling mastiff

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d4 damage per plus, and the target is immobilized (save ends), or +1d8 damage per plus if the target was already immobilized

block.name: Property
block.line: Attacks using this implement ignore penalties from cover.

item.title: Implement of Insurmountable Force
item.fluff: The repulsive force emanating from this implement makes it hard to grasp

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with an arcane attack power
EffectYou push the triggering creature a number of squares equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Iron Infusion
item.fluff: With the aid of this implement, your magical infusions also toughen your ally's skin, making him or her resistant to damage
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with an attack that increases an ally's defenses

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a Magical Infusion class feature power on an ally, that ally gains resist all until the end of your next turn. The resist equals 1 + twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect Ranged 10 (one ally); The target gains resist all until the end of your next turn. The resist equals 2 + three times this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Judicious Conjuration
item.fluff: This tome ensures the longevity of your conjuration spells and also allows you to sustain effects more easily

block.name: Property
block.line: You add the enhancement bonus of this tome to your Will defense when dispel magic is used against one of your conjurations or summons.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou sustain a power that would otherwise require a minor action to do so, or give a summoned creature a minor action command.

item.title: Implement of Light
item.fluff: The followers of the deities are not the only ones with radiance that sears undead
item.headline: Critical+1d6 radiant damage per plus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementThis implement is the target of the light wizard cantrip.

EffectMelee touch (this implement); Until the end of the encounter or until this implement is no longer the target of a light cantrip, undead creatures that end their turn within the bright light take radiant damage equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Reproach
item.fluff: This implement delivers a debilitating attack that saps your enemy's vitality and impairs its ability to persevere

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack delivered by this implement
EffectThe triggering enemy is debilitated until the end of your next turn.
While debilitated, the enemy takes a -2 penalty to all saving throws and cannot regain hit points by any means.

item.title: Implement of Sanguinary Repercussion
item.fluff: This implement of brilliant crimson hastens injured enemies to their doom
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a bloodied target

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this implement
EffectEach bloodied creature within 5 squares of you takes 1d10 + this implement's enhancement bonus damage.
Level 15 or 202d10 + this implement's enhancement bonus damage.
Level 25 or 303d10 + this implement's enhancement bonus damage.

item.title: Implement of Shared Healing
item.fluff: This implement allows you to heal an ally even as you tend to your own wounds

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use either your second wind or a power that allows you to spend a healing surge
EffectClose burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target can spend a healing surge to regaina number of hit points equal to his or her healing surge value

item.title: Implement of Spectral Hands
item.fluff: The true power of this implement lies in its clever utility

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use the mage hand power, you can conjure additional hands. The maximum number of hands you can conjure equals 1 + this implement's enhancement bonus.
You can sustain and move all of the hands with a single action, but picking up an object requires an individual command.

item.title: Implement of Supplementary Force
item.fluff: This implement crafted from scarlet glass pulses with barely controlled energy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 force damage per plus, and the target is knocked prone

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your current turn, each enemy you hit with an arcane close wave attack using this implement is knocked prone after all other effects of the attack have been resolved.

item.title: Implement of Sweet Sanctuary
item.fluff: This silvery sheen of this implement grows to surround you at your command, warding off danger

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn. The bonus equals 3 + this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Thorns
item.fluff: This implement is carved from briar vines with their thorns left intact, so that it cannot be firmly gripped without drawing blood
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus, or +1d8 psychic damage per plus if you're bloodied

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be bloodied.
TriggerYou hit a creature with an Implement attack using this implement
EffectThe triggering creature takes additional psychic damage from the triggering attack. The psychic damage equals the number of healing surges you have spent
Level 15 or 20Equals 2 + the number of healing surges you have spent.
Level 25 or 30Equals 2 + twice the number of healing surges you have spent.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must be bloodied.
EffectYou spend a healing surge to gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value + 3 + twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Implement of Tongues
item.fluff: Language is no barrier while you wield this tome

block.name: Property
block.line: You are understood, even if you do not speak a language the listener can speak. The listener must still understand at least one language.

item.title: Implement of Vengeance
item.fluff: This implement allows you to extract your wrath upon your enemies, returning their attacks with devastation
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this implement
EffectIf the triggering enemy has dealt damage to you or an ally since the end of your previous turn, the triggering attack deals it +1d8 additional damage.
Level 14 or 19+2d8 additional damage.
Level 24 or 29+3d8 additional damage.
If the triggering enemy has reduced you or an ally to 0 hit points or fewer since the end of your previous turn, the triggering attack instead deals it +2d8 additional damage.
Level 14 or 19+4d8 additional damage.
Level 24 or 29+6d8 additional damage.

item.title: Implement of Vigor
item.fluff: This implement rewards your good health with increased might

headline.condition: when you are at maximum hit points

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 bonus to attacks rolls using this implement while you're at maximum hit points.

item.title: Implement of Wind
item.fluff: This feather-light implement of cloudy crystal allows you to command the air

block.name: Critical
block.line: you can push the target 1 square. If the attack already pushes, pulls, or slides, increase the maximum distance of that forced movement by 1 square instead.
Level 15 or 20Push up to 2 squares, or increase forced movement by 2 squares.
Level 25 or 30Push up to 3 squares, or increase forced movement by 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackClose wave 5 (each creature in the wave); Item's level +4 vs. Fortitude
HitYou push the target up to a number of squares equal to 1 + this implement's enhancement bonus.
MissYou push the target up to 1 squares.
Level 20, 25 or 30Up to 2 squares.

item.title: Implement of Wonder
item.fluff: Few can call on the power of this implement without a mingled sense of amazement and dread

block.name: Critical
block.line: you might teleport yourself and the target:
You must teleport the target a number of squares equal to the number of critical damage dice that roll a 6.
You must teleport yourself a number of squares equal to the number of critical damage dice that roll a 1.

item.title: Ioun-Blessed Symbol
item.fluff: This symbol, blessed with Ioun's love of knowledge, is a slender of ivory with only a suggestion of her icon

block.name: Property
block.line: An arcane character can wield this symbol in hand, treating it as a wand implement.

item.title: Iron Body Ki Focus
item.fluff: This set of weights consists of rune-scribed chunks of lead laced together with leather straps that, when tied to your feet and hands, allow you to perform the exercises needed to master the iron body technique

block.name: Property
block.line: Once per turn, when you hit an enemy with an attack using this ki focus, you gain resist all against attacks made by that enemy until the end of your next turn. The resist equals twice this ki focus' enhancement bonus.

item.title: Ironscar Rod
item.fluff: This heavy iron ron, shaped like two twisting serpents, scours enemies with acid

block.name: Property
block.line: This rod counts as the mace simple weapon.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with an attack using this rod
EffectThe triggering creature takes an extra +1d8 acid damage from the triggering attack, and a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 13 or 18+2d8 acid damage.
Level 23 or 28+3d8 acid damage.

item.title: Leaves of Death
item.fluff: The black leaves that make up this implement replenish themselves when you consume one to gain the aid spirits

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou spend an action point
EffectYou make a saving throw against one effect on you that a save can end. You gain a bonus to this saving throw equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Lightning Wand
item.fluff: With this wand, your lightning powers crackle with extra energy
item.headline: Lightning

block.name: Arc Lightning
block.line: AttackRanged 10/20 (one creature, or two creatures within 5 squares of each other); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Level 23 or 282d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

EffectIf you targeted two creatures, both creatures take lightning damage at the end of each creature's turn if they are within 5 squares of each other. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn, and the damage equals your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Sustain Standard: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.
In addition, you pull each creature two squares towards each other. If they end the pull adjacent to each other, both take 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
Level 23 or 282d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

item.title: Magic Holy Symbol
item.fluff: A holy symbol of your god, enchanted with magical power

item.title: Magic Ki Focus
item.fluff: A minor focus, enchanted to help channel mystical power

item.title: Magic Orb
item.fluff: A standard crystal orb, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Magic Rod
item.fluff: A standard rod, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Magic Staff
item.fluff: A staff, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Magic Tome
item.fluff: An enchanted tome, filled with elementary magical lore

item.title: Magic Totem
item.fluff: This item is a simple totem that channels primal energy

item.title: Magic Wand
item.fluff: A basic wand, enchanted to channel magical energies

item.title: Manual of Ninjutsu
item.fluff: The most basic manual of the ninja teaches the secret of using the shadows as a weapon

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your assassin's strike class power and the target is granting you combat advantage, you can reroll any 1 on the power's damage dice until that die's result is anything else than a 1.
Level 13 or 18Reroll any 1 or 2 until that die's result is anything else than a 1 or 2.
Level 23 or 28Reroll any 1, 2 or 3 until that die's result is anything else than a 1, 2 or 3.

item.title: Master's Wand
item.fluff: Your chosen power has an added benefit

block.name: Property
block.line: Each master's wand is keyed to a specific arcane at-will attack, and has a specific benefit when it is used for chosen power. Work with your DM if you there isn't currently one for the power you want.

block.name: Custom Power
block.line: Each master's wand allows the use of the chosen at-will attack as an encounter power using the wand's level for its statistics.

item.title: Master's Wand of Cloud of Daggers
item.fluff: Your cloud of daggers strikes with deadly accuracy

block.name: Property
block.line: The zone created by your cloud of daggers deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

block.name: Cloud of Daggers
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (one creature in the center square); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit 1d4 + Intelligence modifier force damage.
Level 23 or 282d4 + Intelligence modifier force damage.
EffectThe area creates a zone of whirling force daggers until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain, and a creature that ends its turn in the zone takes force damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18Equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Dire Radiance
item.fluff: Your dire radiance presses against foes with an invisible force

block.name: Property
block.line: Each square that a target affected by your dire radiance moves towards you costs 1 additional square of movement, instead of just the first square.

block.name: Dire Radiance
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
Level 23 or 282d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
If the target willingly moves nearer to you before the start of your next turn, it takes radiant damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18Equal to 6 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28Equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Eldritch Combat
item.fluff: Your eldritch combat power viciously scours your enemies
item.headline: eldritch blast, eldritch bolt, and eldritch strike

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: When this wand is created, the creator chooses either eldritch blast, eldritch bolt, or eldritch strike. You gain the chosen power as an encounter power.

item.title: Master's Wand of Ethereal Chill
item.fluff: Your ethereal chill also empower's your ally's attack

block.name: Property
block.line: The ally in the center square of your ethereal chill power deals additional cold damage on the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn. The additional damage equals your Wisdom modifier.

block.name: Ethereal Chill
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 centered on an ally within 5 squares (creatures in the burst other than the center ally); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus cold damage.
Level 23 or 281d6 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
EffectUntil the end of your next turn, each time an enemy hits or misses the center ally with a melee attack, it takes cold damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Level 13 or 183 + your Wisdom modifier cold damage.
Level 23 oe 28: 6 + your Wisdom modifier cold damage.

item.title: Master's Wand of Eyebite
item.fluff: Your eyebite spell occludes you just a moment longer than normal

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit a target with your eyebite power using this wand, you gain combat advantage on your first attack roll against the target after the invisibility ends and before the end of your next turn.

block.name: Eyebite
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
Hit 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you are invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.
MissYou gain concealment against the target until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Master's Wand of Eyes of the Vestige
item.fluff: This ebony wand strikes your targets with devastating power

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit a target with eyes of the vestige power using this wand, the second target can be within 5 squares of the target instead of 3 squares, and you gain a +1 bonus to your Warlock's Curse damage for each die of curse damage for that attack.

block.name: Eyes of the Vestige
block.line: AttackMelee touch or ranged 10 (one creature under your curse); Charisma vs. Will
Hit1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Level 24 or 292d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Choose one creature within 5 squares of the target and within your line of sight. You place your curse on that creature.
If the chosen creature is already under your curse, you can choose to deal your curse damage to it instead of the target.
EffectYou gain an effect depending on your active vestige:
King ElidyrOne ally who hits the target before the end of your next turn can roll a saving throw against one effeect that a save can end.
ZutwaYou gain your Prime Shot or Prime Strike bonus against the target until the end of your next turn.
Your daily powers can give you access to other vestiges. See the "Eyes of the Vestige Augment" entry for the vestige to see what effect it has on this power.

item.title: Master's Wand of Force Missiles
item.fluff: Your missiles of arcane force impact with the force of a rushing bull

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit a target with your force projectile, or damage a target with your magic missile, you can push the target 1 square.
Level 23 or 28Push 2 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: When this wand is created, the creator chooses either force projectile or magic missile. The wand has the chosen power as an encounter power.

item.title: Master's Wand of Hellish Rebuke
item.fluff: Your hellish rebuke consumes your attacker and its nearby allies

block.name: Property
block.line: When the target of your hellish rebuke power takes fire damage because an enemy damages you, its allies adjacent to it also take one-half the fire damage.

block.name: Hellish Rebuke
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
Level 23 or 282d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage.
EffectEach time you take damage before the end of your next turn, the target takes fire damage. The damage equals your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18Equals 4 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28Equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Illusory Ambush
item.fluff: With this red palm wand, your phantoms continue to harass your enemies

block.name: Property
block.line: The target of your illusory ambush power takes psychic damage each time it makes an attack while suffering from the penalty to attack rolls. The psychic damage equals your Charisma modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Illusory Ambush
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Will
Hit1d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
CritThe attack penalty from this power's effect increases to -4 for triggered attacks.
Level 24 or 292d6 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
EffectThe target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Master's Wand of Misdirected Mark
item.fluff: Disaster awaits those beguiled by this crooked hickory wand

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit with your misdirected mark power, the ally the target becomes marked by gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the target as long as it remains marked.

block.name: Misdirected Mark
block.line: AttackRanged 10/20 (one creature); Charisma vs. Reflex
Hit1d8 + Charisma modifier damage.
Level 24 or 292d8 + Charisma modifier damage.

EffectThe target is marked by an ally of your choice within 5 squares of you until the end of your next turn. The ally gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the target as long as it remains marked.

item.title: Master's Wand of Phantom Bolt
item.fluff: Your illusory bolts become more ominous with this smoky amber wand

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with your phantom bolt power using this wand, you increase the maximum distance of the slide by 2 squares.

block.name: Phantom Bolt
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Will
Hit1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
Level 24 or 292d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage.
EffectYou slide the target 1 square, or 3 squares if the attack hit.
Level 24 or 29Slide 2 squares, or 3 squares if the attack hit.

item.title: Master's Wand of Ray of Frost
item.fluff: Your ray of frost covers the target in so much ice that it can become a hindrance to its allies

block.name: Property
block.line: While the target of your ray of frost power is slowed by that power, it provides cover against attacks by its allies and its allies cannot move through its space.

block.name: Ray of Frost
block.line: AttackRanged 5/10 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
Level 23 or 282d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
EffectThe target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Master's Wand of Scorching Burst
item.fluff: Your scorching burst burns devastatingly hot at its core

block.name: Property
block.line: The center square of the zone created by your scorching burst burns extra hot. A creature that ends its turn occupying the center square takes additional fire damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

block.name: Scorching Burst
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each creature in burst); Intelligence vs. Reflex
Hit 1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage.
EffectThe area becomes a zone of flames until the start of your next turn.
A creature that ends its turn in the zone takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 18Equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 23 or 28Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Master's Wand of Spiteful Presence
item.fluff: This wand is especially deadly to creatures you haven't harmed yet
item.headline: Critical+1d8 damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy that is at maximum hit points and under your curse with your spiteful presence power using this wand, you deal an additional die of curse damage.
Level 24 or 29Two additional dice of curse damage.

block.name: Spiteful Presence
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit1d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

If the target is bloodied and you are not bloodied, the necrotic damage increases to 2d10 + Charisma modifier, and the target gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.
Level 14 or 193d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage if the target is bloodied but you are not.
Level 24 or 292d10 + Charisma modifier damage, or 4d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage if the target is bloodied but you are not.
EffectIf you are not bloodied, the target gains combat advantage against you until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Master's Wand of Staggering Note
item.fluff: Your staggering note includes a perfect cue for your ally to strike

block.name: Property
block.line: When an ally makes a melee basic attack as part of your staggering note power, he or she gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

block.name: Staggering Note
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
Hit Charisma modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus thunder damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Level 23 or 28Push 3 squares.
One ally you can see can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free interrupt either before, during, or after the forced movement.
MissOne ally you can see can make a melee basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.

item.title: Master's Wand of Static Shock
item.fluff: You have mastered the static shock spell, and you can bind your foe with eldritch chains of lightning that empower an ally's attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When the target of your static shock power makes an attack with the penalty to attack rolls from that power, the targets of that attack gains the following benefit:
The next attack the target of the attack makes deals additional lightning damage. The lightning damage equals your Wisdom modifier, or half this if the enemy's attack was a miss.
Level 14 or 19Equals 2 + your Wisdom modifier.
Level 24 or 29Equals 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

block.name: Static Shock
block.line: Attack Ranged 5 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit1d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
The first attack the target makes before the end of your next turn takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.
MissHalf the penalty.
EffectWhen the target makes an attack with the penalty to attack rolls, the targets of that attack gain the following benefit:
The next attack the enemy's target makes deals additional lightning damage. The lightning damage equals your Wisdom modifier, or half this if the enemy's attack was a miss.
Level 14 or 19Equals 2 + your Wisdom modifier.
Level 24 or 29Equals 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

block.name: Static Shock
block.line: AttackRanged 5 (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the first attack the target makes before the end of your next turn takes a penalty equal to your Wisdom modifier on the attack roll.
Level 23 or 282d8 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.
MissHalf the penalty.

item.title: Master's Wand of Thundering Armor
item.fluff: Your ally's armor rumbles with the dread power of thunder
item.headline: Critical+1d8 damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit with the secondary attack of your thundering armor power, you increase the maximum distance of the push by one-half your Wisdom modifier.

block.name: Thundering Armor
block.line: Effect Ranged 5 (one ally); The primary target gains a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn, and you make the secondary attack.

block.name: Secondary Attack
block.line: Secondary AttackClose burst 1 from the primary target's space (one creature); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit1d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the secondary target a number of squares a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Wisdom modifier.

item.title: Master's Wand of Thunderwave
item.fluff: This wand grants the ability to reshape your thunderwave power

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your thunderwave power, you can choose to use it as a close burst 1 instead of a close wave.

block.name: Thunderwave
block.line: AttackClose wave 3 (each creature in the wave); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 23 or 282d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.
MissYou push the target half the distance.

item.title: Master's Wand of Vicious Mockery
item.fluff: Wielding this hackberry wand sharpens your tongue and hones your wit

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit with your vicious mockery power using this wand, choose a different enemy within 2 squares of the target. The chosen enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 14 or 19Within 3 squares.
Level 24 or 29Within 5 squares.

block.name: Vicious Mockery
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
Hit 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 24 or 292d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
Choose an enemy within 5 squares of the target. The chosen creature takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Level 14 or 19Within 3 squares.
Level 24 or 29Within 5 squares.
MissThe target takes a -2 penalty to the first attack roll it makes before the end of your next turn.

item.title: Medallion of Radiance
item.fluff: The light from the sun adorning this golden medallion purifies the body and soul
item.headline: radiant

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: SpecialThis power has the Divine keyword (if this implement is a holy symbol), or Psionic or Shadow keyword (if this implement is a ki focus, chosen by the creator).
TriggerYou reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer with an Implement attack using this implement
EffectClose burst 5 centered on the triggering enemy (each enemy in the burst); Each target takes radiant damage equal to 2 + three times this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Mercurial Rod
item.fluff: When you use this rod, you can forgo dismiss your curse to make one attack more potent

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with an attack and deal your Warlock's Curse damage to it
EffectIncrease your curse damage by two dice.
After the triggering attack has been resolved, the triggering creature is no longer under your curse. You can place your curse on it again normally.

item.title: Mighty Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: This leather bag contains a metal plate that shatters when you focus your ki and strike it, only for it to reappear in the bag
item.headline: Critical+1d8 damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: Your Flurry of Blows power deals +1 extra damage when it is triggered by an attack using this ki focus.
Level 14 or 19+2 extra damage.
Level 24 or 29+3 extra damage.

item.title: Mindshield Implement
item.fluff: This elaborate implement feels right in your hands, but at the same time dreamlike and unnaturally light, as if only partially real

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Saving throws against Charm and Illusion effects

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this implement, you and each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw against one Charm or Illusion, even if that effect normally does not end on a save.

item.title: Moonsilver Staff
item.fluff: This pale wood staff is topped with a moonstone sphere and it harms lycanthropes with radiant energy
item.headline: radiant

block.name: Property
block.line: Weapon attacks and Implement attacks made with this staff count as silvered.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou deal radiant damage to an enemy with an arcane Radiant attack using this staff
EffectThe triggering enemy takes additional radiant damage from the triggering attack equal to twice this staff's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Nature Protector's Effigy
item.fluff: This egg-shaped white stone has a carving of an oak leaf that turns green when surrounded by nature

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against aberrant creatures

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou teleport up to 5 squares to a space adjacent to a plant or a plant creature that is Small or larger.
Level 13 or 18Up to 10 squares.
Level 23 or 28Up to 20 squares.

item.title: Obsidian Wand
item.fluff: When you channel magic through this wand, you feel it grow as cold as the grave

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Item's level + 4 vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d10 + 5 necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Level 13 or 182d10 + 9 necrotic damage.
Level 23 or 283d10 + 12 necrotic damage.
MissHalf damage, and the target is weakened for the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn.
EffectIf the target was reduced to 10 hit points or fewer, it dies.
Level 18, 23 or 28Reduced to 15 hit points or fewer.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou reduce a creature to 10 hit points or fewer with an attack using this wand
Level 13 or 18To 15 hit points or fewer
Level 23 or 28To 20 hit points or fewer
EffectThe triggering creature dies.

item.title: Orb of the Adabtable Mind
item.fluff: This orb lets your body move at the instant you perceive a thread, allowing you and possibly your friends to avoid harm
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus
Item BonusPerception checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits you with an attack
EffectYou gain resist all until the start of the acting creature's next turn.
1Close burst 1 (you and each ally in the burst); Each target gains the resist all.
Level 19, 24 or 292Close burst 2 (you and each ally in the burst); Each target gains the resist all.

item.title: Orb of Debilitating Languor
item.fluff: This shadowy orb leaves your enemy enfeebled

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with an attack against Fortitude

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack against Fortitude using this implement
EffectThe triggering enemy is slowed (save ends).

item.title: Orb of the Discerning Watcher
item.fluff: This crystalline orb focuses your senses to help you perceive your surroundings better

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against a creature that has not yet acted during this encounter

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou would roll Initiative
EffectClose burst 5 (you and each ally in the burst); Each target can choose to use 10 as the result for their roll for the triggering Initiative check instead of rolling.

item.title: Ord of Enduring Magic
item.fluff: Carved from iron to resemble a clenched gauntlet, this orb allows you to extend your magical abilities while absorbing your foes' attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou sustain all of your active powers that can be sustained with a minor action.
Also, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + twice this orb's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Orb of Far Seeing
item.fluff: You capture the image of your enemy in this translucent sphere, leaving him no place to hide

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectChoose a target within 10 squares of you that you can see.
Until the end of the encounter, the chosen creature is considered to be half as far away for the purposes of ranged attacks you make with this orb.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a ranged attack using this orb against the target affected by this orb's encounter power
EffectThe triggering attack does not require line of sight or line of effect to the target, and takes no penalty for concealment, cover or range.

item.title: Orb of Fiery Condemnation
item.fluff: Enemies you face have a tendency of exploding into fire

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou deal fire damage to an enemy using this orb
EffectThe triggering enemy takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Level 12 or 17Ongoing 10 fire damage.
Level 22 or 27Ongoing 15 fire damage.

item.title: Orb of Forceful Magic
item.fluff: This transparent orb shimmers and glows with golden energy that you can channel to hurl your enemies about

block.name: Property
block.line: When you pull, push, or slide an enemy with a power using this orb, you can increase the maximum distance of that forced movement by 1 square.

item.title: Orb of Frustrated Recovery
item.fluff: This scarlet sphere shines with an inner light when you use it to frustrate your enemy's attempts to recover from your attack

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy within 5 squares of you saves against ongoing damage
EffectThe triggering enemy instead fails the triggering saving throw.

item.title: Orb of Impenetrable Escape
item.fluff: This murky orb reflects the visage of your enemy suffering from an ongoing barrage of conditions and afflictions

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerA creature succeeds on a saving throw against an effect you created
