EffectThe triggering creature must reroll the triggeirng saving throw and use the second result.

item.title: Orb of Indisputable Gravity
item.fluff: This sphere is made of sky blue crystal

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, any attack you make using this orb that hits a target within 10 squares of you also forces that target to gently fall 10 squares. If this descent brings the creature to the ground, it lands prone but takes no damage from the fall.

item.title: Orb of Inevitable Continuance
item.fluff: A sphere of gray crystal that appears as a ball of solid mist

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack made with this orb
EffectOne of your powers that would end and the of your current turn instead lasts until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Orb of Life Conversion
item.fluff: This black of feeds on your life firce instead of your reserves to augment your powers
item.headline: necrotic

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use a psionic power using this orb
EffectYou expend a healing surge to augment the triggering power instead of using power points. You can choose an augment costing up to 2 power points.
Level 15 or 20Up to 4 power points.
Level 25 or 30Up tp 6 power points.

item.title: Orb of Mental Constitution
item.fluff: This rough brown stone reinforces your hardiness with your mental toughness

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn attack targets your AC or Fortitude
EffectThe triggering attack instead targets your Will.
Augment 1: You also gain a +2 power bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.
Level 23 or 28This becomes an augment 2 for a +4 power bonus.

item.title: Orb of Mental Dominion
item.fluff: A spellcaster channeling his mind through this orb gains mental prowess over foes, forcing them to relive the effects of a spell
item.headline: psychic

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an Implement attack against Will using this orb
EffectThe triggering enemy must roll twice and take the lower result each time it makes a saving throw against the triggering attack.

item.title: Orb of Nimble Thoughts
item.fluff: This scarlet crystal lets you move across the battlefield at the speed of thought to avoid your foes' attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou shift a number of squares equal to 2 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.
Level 13 or 18Equal to 3 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.
Level 23 or 28Equal to 4 + one-half your Intelligence modifier.
Augment 1: You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

item.title: Orb of Psionic Recovery
item.fluff: This pink sphere absorbs lingering psionic energy and harnesses it for your use
item.headline: Critical+1d6 dmaage per plus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn ally within 5 squares of you misses with an augmented psionic attack power
EffectYou regain 2 power points.
Level 14 or 19Regain 4 power points.
Level 24 or 29Regain 6 power points.

item.title: Orb of Psychic Conversion
item.fluff: This clear crystal orb imbues your attacks with psychic energy and channels the pain of psychic damage you take, sending it to your enemies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make an attack using this orb
EffectThe triggering attack deals psychic damage and gains the Psychic keyword.
If the attack normally deals one or more types of damage, it does not deal damage of those types, and loses the associated keywords.

item.title: Orb of Punishing Thoughts
item.fluff: This crystal blazes with light, assailing the minds of your enemies and leaving them at your mercy

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy within 3 squares of you with a Psychic attack using this implement
EffectClose burst 1 (each enemy in the burst); Each target grants combat advantag to you (save ends).
Level 18, 23 or 28: Close burst 2
Augment 1: Increase the burst by 1.

item.title: Orb of Relentless Sympathy
item.fluff: This orb empathically links you and your allies physical senses to your enemy's mind, causing it to feel your pain when it harms you
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus
Item BonusInsight checks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a target with an attack using this orb
EffectYou establish an empathic link in the target's mind until the end of the encounter. You can end this effect as a minor action.
At the end of any of its turn when it deals damage to you or one of your allies, the enemy takes psychic damage equall to 2 + twice this orb's enhancement bonus.
If the target is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you lose a healing surge from the feedback. If you have no healing surges remaining, you instead lose hit points equal your healing surge value.

item.title: Orb of Resilient Tenacity
item.fluff: The constant buzzing whisper that issues from this amethyst orb reinforces your will

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this orb, choose one effect that a save can end on either you or an ally within 5 squares of you. Saving throws against the chosen effect gain a power bonus equal to this orb's enhancement bonus until that effect ends.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (you or one ally in the burst); The target gains a power bonus to saving throws against one effect of his or her choice until that effect ends. The bonus equals this orb's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Orb of the Peerless Artist
item.fluff: This blue stone lets you shape psionic magic as you wish
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus
Item BonusInsight checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a psionic attack that is a burst or wave using this orb
EffectYou can exclude a number of squares from the burst or wave equal this implement's enhancement bonus.
1The triggering attack deals additional psychic damage equal to three times the number of excluded squares. This power and the triggering power gain the Psychic keyword.

item.title: Orb of Psychic Knives
item.fluff: This light metal orb lets you form a mental link to your foe, allowing you to disorient it by amplifying the pain it feels
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus
Item BonusIntimidate checks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a psionic attack using this orb
EffectYou slide the triggering enemy 1 square.
Level 19, 24 or 29:Slide up to 2 squares.
Until the end of your next turn, whenever the enemy takes damage from an attack, you can slide it 1 square as a free reaction.
Level 24 or 29Slide up to 2 squares.
Sustain MinorThe effect persists until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Orb of Scourging Revelation
item.fluff: The ancient glyphs carved on the surface of this orb weaken your enemies' ability to withstand attacks on their mind
item.headline: CriticalThe target gains vulnerable psychic equal to 3 + twice this orb's enhancement bonus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Psychic or Radiant attack using this orb
EffectClose burst 1 (each enemy in the burst); Each target gains vulnerable 5 psychic (save ends).
2Close burst 2.
Level 15 or 20Vulnerable 10 psychic.
Level 25 or 30Vulnerable 15 psychic.

item.title: Orb of Stored Energy
item.fluff: This glittering sphere stores psionic energy that you can unleash when your own power has waned

block.name: Proeprty
block.line: This orb stores up to 2 power points. The orb regains any spent power points when you take an extended rest.
Level 15 or 20Up to 4 power points.
Level 25 or 30Up to 6 power points.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementThis orb has power points remaining, and you have no power points remaining.
TriggerYou use an augmentable power using this orb
EffectYou augment the triggering power using power points from this orb.

item.title: Orb of the Sympathetic Eye
item.fluff: This crystal orb, which changes color to fit the moods of those around you, lets you transmit your enemy's pain to another
item.headline: Critical+1d6 psychic damage per plus
Item BonusInsight checks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this orb
EffectChoose a creature adjacent to the triggering enemy that is not a target of the triggering attack.
The chosen creature takes psychic damage equal to one-half the damage taken by the triggering enemy.

item.title: Orb of the Temporal Juggler
item.fluff: This multicolored orb allows you to steal bits of time from your enemies to accomplish more than you normally could
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus
Item BonusHistory checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerOn your turn, you daze or stun an enemy with a psionic attack using this staff
EffectYou can take an additional move action or minor action during your current turn.

item.title: Orb of the Third Eye
item.fluff: This orb has a carving that resembles a closed eye which opens when you channel a power through an ally's location
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a ranged Implement attack using this orb
EffectClose burst 5 (one ally in the burst); You make the triggering attack from the target's space instead of your own.

item.title: Orb of Ultimate Imposition
item.fluff: The will of this orb's wielder imposes great force on an enemy, crippling its power

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You use your orb of imposition class power on a power that ends on a successful save
EffectThe penalty imposed by your orb of imposition increases by -2.

item.title: Orb of Unfailing Concentration
item.fluff: This oval orb helps you maintain your concentration, absorbing any psionic energy that escapes when your focus is broken

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou miss all targets with an augmented attack using this orb
EffectYou regain the power points you spent to augment the triggering power.

item.title: Orb of Unlucky Exchange
item.fluff: You shift the reflection of your ally into that of your enemy to offer relief by transferring an affliction to that enemy

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a target with an attack using this orb
EffectChoose one effect currently affecting you or an ally within 5 squares of you.
You transfer the chosen effect to the triggering target. It is affected for the same duration that you or the ally was affected by it.

item.title: Orb of Unstoppable Decline
item.fluff: You can use this purple crystal spehere to capture your foe's image and subject it to a continuous psychic assault
item.headline: Critical+1d8 psychic damage per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a Psychic attack using this orb
EffectUntil the end of the encounter, whenever the enemy succeeds in a saving throw, it takes psychic damage equal to twice this orb's enhancement bonus.
2The psychic damage equals 2 + three times this orb's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Orium Implement
item.fluff: The glyphs carved into this implement suggest its ability to recall mundane and magical secrets
item.headline: Item BonusKnowledge checks and monster knowledge checks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an at-will melee or ranged arcane attack using this implement
EffectYou use the triggering attack again. You cannot target the same target or targets as you targeted with the triggering attack.

item.title: Psychic Ravaging Wand
item.fluff: With this wand in hand, your psychic attacks tear through your enemies' minds
item.headline: Psychic

block.name: Eyebite
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
Hit 1d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you are invisible to the target until the start of your next turn.
MissYou gain concealment against the target until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Quickcurse Rod
item.fluff: With this rod, you can curse any creature you can see

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus; If you have the Warlock's Curse class feature and the creature is not under your curse, you place your curse on it

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have the Warlock's Curse class feature.
TriggerYou hit a creature with a power using this rod
EffectYou place your curse on a different creature you can see.

item.title: Quick Strike Ki Focus
item.fluff: This long rope coils around your hands and feet, teaching you to strike with foot and hand as one

block.name: Critical
block.line: you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.
Level 24 or 29Up to 2 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou damage an enemy with your Flurry of Blows class power
EffectYou make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy.

item.title: Rain of Hammers Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small, wooden box holds a pair of leaden hammers and a tiny drum you can play to sharpen your ki, accustoming your arms to deliver a steady stream of powerful attacks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer
EffectMelee 1 (one enemy adjacent to you); The target takes damage equal to twice this ki focus' enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have hit at least one enemy with an attack during your current turn
EffectMake an at-will attack against an enemy that you have hit with an attack.
This attack is not restricted by the Full Discipline keyword and does not restrict your other attacks.

item.title: Reclaimer's Totem
item.fluff: When you channel primal energy through this totem and use it to aid a dying comrade, the spirits provide some of their own essence to the effort

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a primal Healing power to restore hit points to a bloodied creature, that creature regains additional hit points equal to this totem's enhancement bonus. If the creature has 0 hit points or fewer, regains regains an additional 1d6 hit points per plus of this item instead.

item.title: Roaring Bear Totem
item.fluff: Carved from the great claw of a dire bear, this totem growls like that mighty beast when you channel primal power through it

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a primal attack using this totem
EffectYou knock the triggering enemy prone.

item.title: Rod of Absorption
item.fluff: This rod is prized for its power to negate all forms of energy
item.headline: Critical+1d8 damage per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with an attack using this rod, and the creature has an active aura
EffectThe triggering aura is deactivated and, the triggering creature can't reactivate the aura (save ends).

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy targets you with a close attack or area attack, and the attack has a damage type keyword
EffectThe triggering enemy takes a -5 penalty to all attack rolls with the triggering attack.

item.title: Rod of Avernus
item.fluff: This brass rod is tipped with a gleaming, red jewel that glows with a yellow aura and as you grasp it, your enemies instinctively cower before you

block.name: Property
block.line: When you gain the benefits of your Pact Boon class feature, you can slide each enemy under your curse 1 square.
Level 23 or 28Slide 2 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you takes 5 psychic damage.
Level 13 or 1810 psychic damage.
Level 23 or 2815 psychic damage.

item.title: Rod of Blinding Awe
item.fluff: Power channeled through this rod overwhelms your foe with awe, rooting it in place

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an Implement attack using this rod
EffectThe triggering enemy is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Rod of Burgeoning Memory
item.fluff: The astral essence in this rod ties you more tightly to your earlier lives as a deva

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus if you used your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to improve an attack roll for this attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your memory of a thousand lifetimes racial power to improve the attack roll of a divine attack power used through this rodd, you add +2 to the roll.

item.title: Rod of Corruption
item.fluff: This rod magnifies and multiplies your Warlock's Curse

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you deal your Warlock's Curse damage on critical hit

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever your Pact Boon is triggered, you can choose to gain the following benefit instead of the normal benefit:
Each enemy within 4 squares of the triggering enemy is cursed by you.
Level 13 or 18Within 5 squares.
Level 23 or 28Within 6 squares.

item.title: Rod of Cursed Honor
item.fluff: You can channel the power of your curse when you use this rod, increasing your defenses

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you place your Warlock's Curse on a target, you gain a +1 item bonus to your Fortitude, Reflex, and Will until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Rod of Dark Reward
item.fluff: This rod channels your Warlock's Curse while hardening you against attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you place your Warlock's Curse on an enemy, you gain a +1 item bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Rod of Deadly Casting
item.fluff: Infused with destructive magic and covered in death symbols, this rod amplifies lethal magical strikes

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with this rod, you can reroll one of the extra damage dice granted by a critical hit. You must use the second result, even if it is lower.
Level 12 or 17Two of the dice.
Level 22 or 27Three of the dice.

item.title: Rod of the Dragonborn
item.fluff: A fierce dragon head tops this scaly scepter
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Property
block.line: All damage dealt with arcane attacks using this rod is of the same type as your draon breath racial power and has the same damage keyword. This replaces any damage type and corresponding keyword the power normally has.
If your dragon breath racial power can deal different types of damage, your arcane attacks deal the type or types your dragon breath dealt the last time you used it.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy under your curse with an arcane power using this rod
EffectUntil the end of your next turn, you can force the triggering enemy to exhale your breath weapon instead of you.

When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to use a square in the triggering creature's space as the point of origin. If you do, the attack also targets the triggering creature, even if it is not inside the area of effect.

item.title: Rod of Eldritch Chaining
item.fluff: This graven rod allows you to target multiple foes when engaging in eldritch combat

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You use your eldritch blast, eldritch bolt, or eldritch strike power
EffectYou can target two creatures with the triggering attack.
Level 18, 23 or 28Target two or three creatures.

item.title: Rod of Elemental Shielding
item.fluff: The gauges on this thick baton are festooned with elemental runes, marking it asn an artificer's implement that augments spells with energy protection

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an Implement power using this rod
EffectClose burst 1 (you and each ally in the burst); Choose one of acid, cold, fire, or lightning.
Each target gains resist against the chosen damage type equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.
Level 12 or 17Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 22 or 27Equal to 10 + your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Rod of Feythorns
item.fluff: Formed of a stalk and strange root bulb, this rod seems to weep steaming toxic liquid, able to poison even those foes normally immune
item.headline: poison

block.name: Property
block.line: When you place your Warlock's Curse on a target, that target's resistance to poison is diminished (save ends).
While its resistance is diminished, it gains one of the following effects:
Target has immunity to poisonThe target instead has resist poison equal to 5 + one-half its level.
Target has resist to poisonThe target loses that resist.
Target has no immunity or resist to poisonThe target gains vulnerable 5 poison.
Level 12 or 17Vulnerable 10 poison.
Level 22 or 27Vulnerable 15 poison.

item.title: Rod of the Fickle Servant
item.fluff: This special rod gives you access to a different vestige when you need it

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have the Vestige Pact and the Warlock's Curse class features.
TriggerYou hit a creature under your curse with an attack using this rod
EffectYou make one of your primary vestiges your active vestige.

item.title: Rod of Forceful Invocation
item.fluff: When your prayer smites your foes, they stagger backward under the weight of this rod's power
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a divine attack using this rod
EffectYou push the triggering enemy 2 squares and knock it prone. If the triggering attack already pushes the target on a hit, this applies as a separate push resolved after the attack's.
Level 14 or 19Push 3 squares.
Level 24 or 29Push 5 squares.

item.title: Rod of Hope Triumphant
item.fluff: As your goe falls, the divine power of this rod invigorates you, for justice has been served

block.name: Property
block.line: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer with a divine attack power using this rod, you gain temporary hit points equal to the three times the rod's enhancement bonus. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Rod of the Infernal
item.fluff: This rod enchances one's ability to draw life from enemies when following an infernal pact

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, of +1d10 damage per plus with powers of the Infernal Pact

block.name: Property
block.line: When you trigger your Infernal Pact Boon, you can add the enhancement bonus of the rod to the number of temporary hit points gained.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have the Infernal Pact feature
EffectYou gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Rod of Malign Conveyance
item.fluff: A smoky crystal caps this rod, which allows you to use teleportation as a weapon

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and you can teleport the target a number of squares equal to this rod's enhancement bonus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5 (you, one ally in the burst, and one enemy in the burst); You teleport each target a number of squares equal to this rod's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Rod of Office
item.fluff: A badge of office and implement of power, this rod is granted to templars by their sorcerer-kings

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have the Pact Boon feature of the Sorcerer-King Pact class feature.
EffectYou regain the use of your Fell Might.

item.title: Rod of the Pactbinder
item.fluff: An oath inscribed on this rod gives you quick access to one of your vestige patrons
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with vestige dailies

block.name: Property
block.line: Each rod of the pactbinder is bound to a vestige.
The creater can bind the rod to one of their vestiges when creating it. If he or she does not, the rod cannot be used before one is bound to it.
A warlock with a vestige can bind one of their vestiges to the rod as part of a rest.
Once a rod of the pactbinder has been bound to a vestige, the bound vestige cannot be changed.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy under your Warlock's Curse with an attack using this rod
EffectThe vestige bound to the rod becomes your active vestige.

item.title: Rod of Reaving
item.fluff: This rod enhances the damage dealt to those suffering your curse
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damager per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a target under your Warlock's Curse

block.name: Property
block.line: When you place your Warlock's Curse on a creature, that creature takes damage equal to twice this rod's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Rod of Repair
item.fluff: This rod's wielder shares in the benefits he or she grants to an ally

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an Implement power using this rod
Until the end of your next turn, whenever you use an Arcane Healing power on an ally, you regain a number of hit points equal to twice this rod's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Rod of Revenge
item.fluff: This rod resembles a short spear carved from black wood and, with it, you can gain the upper hand against any foe that dares to attack you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits you
EffectYou gain combat advantage with attacks using this rod against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Rod of Scathing Scorn
item.fluff: Clutching this blackened bone scepter, you channel life-draining power at your enemy
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with an attack where you spend your Fell Might

block.name: Property
block.line: When you spend your Fell Might on a power where you use this rod, you gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + twice this rod's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an arcane attack power using this rod
EffectYou spend your Fell Might to deal the triggering enemy ongoing necrotic damage (save ends). The ongoing necrotic damage equals 3 + twice this rod's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Rod of the Shadow Walker
item.fluff: With this gloom-shrouded rod in hand, the shadows around you seem deeper to those you place your curse on
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, of +1d8 damage per plus if both you and the target are in darkness

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you place your Warlock's Curse on a creature, you gain concealment against that creature until the end of your next turn. If you have the Shadow Walk class feature, you count as having concealment from that feature.

item.title: Rod of Smiting
item.fluff: The head of this rod flares outward like a mace, and it weighs heavily in your hand, allowing you to make heavy strikes with it like a weapon

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 force damage per plus, or +1d10 force damage per plus when used as a melee weapon

block.name: Property
block.line: This rod can be used as a melee weapon, functioning as the mace simple weapon.
You add its enhancement bonus to the attack rolls and damage rolls of melee Weapon attacks you make with it.

item.title: Rod of Stolen Starlight
item.fluff: At your command, this rod infuses your spell with light from mysterious stars
item.headline: radiant and necrotic

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an undead creature affected by your Warlock's Curse with an attack using this rod, you deal additional damage equal to this rod's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectThe first Necrotic or Poison attack you make using this rod before the end of the encounter deals radiant damage instead of necrotic or poison damage, and has the Radiant keyword instead of the Necrotic or Poison keyword.

item.title: Rod of Time Distortion
item.fluff: This crystal rod allows you to distort time as you cast a spell, depriving an enemy of the opportunity to retaliate

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a ranged attack using this implement
EffectThe triggering attack does not provoke reactive strikes for making a ranged attack.

item.title: Rod of Wrathful Dismissal
item.fluff: This rod's power lets you move a foe into a position where your allies can deal with it
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy hits you with an attack
EffectYou slide the triggering enemy 2 squares to a space adjacent to one of your allies.
Level 14 or 19Slide 3 squares.
Level 24 or 29Slide 4 squares.

item.title: Scavenger Bird Ki Focus
item.fluff: This onyx statue of a raven with outspread wings helps you not to waste killing strokes upon the dying

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this ki focus, any shrouds you chose to invoke before the attack deal 2 extra damage.
Level 12 or 17Extra 3 damage.
Level 22 or 27Extra 5 damage.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must have the Assassin's Shroud class feature.
TriggerYou hit an enemy with your shrouds on it
EffectYou move all your shrouds on the triggering enemy to another enemy within 10 squares of you (up to the maximum number of shrouds allowed).

item.title: Shadow Master Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small silver tablet is no larger than the handheld mirrors carried by many nobles, though it looks dull because of the secrets of shadow magic carved into its surface in hundreds of lines of tiny text

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 necrotic damage per plus, or +1d10 necrotic damage per plus if you're hidden from the target

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make an attack using this ki focus against an enemy from which you are hidden, that enemy takes extra necrotic damage from the attack. The necrotic damage equals twice this ki focus' enhancement bonus.

item.title: Shepherd's Totem
item.fluff: This totem emits an atmosphere of gentle command, lending the weight of nature's authority to your attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: When you pull, push, or slide a creature with an attack using this totem, you can increase the distance of the forced movement by 1 square.

item.title: Shielding Wand
item.fluff: As your spell obliterates your enemy, this heavy juniper wand creates a shimmering protective shield
item.headline: Crtical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with an artificer attack using this wand, you or one ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Shielding Cube
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 5 squares (each enemy in the burst); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit1d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target 2 squares from the burst origin square.
MissYou push the target 1 square from the burst's origin square.
EffectYou create a zone of protective force in the burst until the end of your next turn.
While in the zone, you and allies gain a power bonus to AC. The power bonus equals one-half your Wisdom modifier (minimum +1 bonus).

item.title: Skull of Terror
item.fluff: Channeling magic through this skull infects your enemies with an overwhelming urge to flee from your presence
item.headline: psychic

item.title: Soul Siphon Ki Focus
item.fluff: This small onyx tablet is no larger than your hand, its surface engraved with lines of text describing how to heed the signs that presage the death of your prey

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if the target is bloodied

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou kill a nonminion creature adjacent to you with an attack using this ki focus
EffectYou gain two healing surges.
If the triggering attack has the shadow power source, this can bring you above your normal maximum.

item.title: Spirit Reliquary
item.fluff: You take heart knowing that your ancestors' bones rest inside the intricately carved box around your neck

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against Charm effects and Fear effects.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain a power bonus to the first skill check, ability check, or saving throw you make before the end of the encounter. The power bonus equals this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Spring Renewal Totem
item.fluff: This totem carries the primal magic of spring, representing the power to restore life
item.headline: Item BonusHeal checks

block.name: Critical
block.line: one ally within 5 squares of you regains hit points equal to twice this totem's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a primal attack using this totem
EffectClose burst 5 (one ally); The target gains regeneration until the end of the encounter. The regeneration equals twice this totem's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Staff of Aggressive Force
item.fluff: Psionic energy flows through this iron staff to scatter the enemies confronting you
item.headline: force

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy within 3 squares of you with a Force attack using this staff
EffectYou push each enemy adjacent to you a number of squares equal to this staff's enhancement bonus.
1You gain resist all until the end of your next turn. The resist equals 1 + twice this staff's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Staff of Artifice
item.fluff: Mechanical parts swirl around the end of this segmented steel shaft and when you infuse an artifice with creation, it gives a slight hum

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an Implement attack using this staff
EffectUntil the end of your next turn, creatures summoned by your artificer powers gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls.
Level 15 or 20+3 power bonus to damage rolls.
Level 25 or 30+4 power bonus to damage rolls.

item.title: Staff of Bitter Dismissal
item.fluff: When you batter an enemy with a forceful attack, this gnarled staff's potent psionic energy shunts the foe away from you
item.headline: force

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy within 3 squares of you with a Force attack using this staff
EffectYou teleport the triggering enemy a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half this staff's enhancement bonus.
1Before you teleport the triggering creature, each enemy within 3 squares of it is pulled 1 square towards it.
Level 22 or 272Before you teleport the triggering creature, each enemy within 5 squares of it is pulled 1 square towards it, or pulled 2 squares towards it if it is within 3 squares of it.

item.title: Staff of Divinity
item.fluff: The glowing symbol of a deity rests atop this majestic staff

headline.condition: when used as a holy symbol

block.name: Property
block.line: A character that has implement proficiency with holy symbols can use this staff as a holy symbol. The implement counts as either a holy symbol or a staff implement when used, not both.

item.title: Staff of Draconic Power
item.fluff: Razor-sharp teeth emerge all along the length of this scoured wood
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus of the chosen damage type

block.name: Property
block.line: This staff is attuned to one type of dragon and a damage type corresponding to that type of dragon, chosen at the time of creation.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: This power has the damage keyword corresponding to the chosen damage type
TriggerYou use an arcane power that has the keyword corresponding to the chosen damage type
EffecYou gain resist 10 against the chosen damage type until the end of the encounter.
Level 15 or 20Resist 15.
Level 25 or 30Resist 20.
After the triggering power has been resolved, apply the following effect:
EffectClose burst 1 (each creature in the burst); Each target takes 1d8 fire damage.
Level 15 or 202d8 fire damage.
Level 25 or 303d8 fire damage.

item.title: Staff of the Evader
item.fluff: This green wooden staff ensures that you can slip out of harm's way when you're held in place

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that immobilize or slow you.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou are immobilized
EffectThe immobilizing effects ends on you, and you teleport up to a number of squares equal to 3 + this staff's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Staff of Fiery Might
item.fluff: This staff is engraved with fire symbols and is warm to the touch, and it makes fire spells more potent

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou roll damage for a Fire power and dislike the result
EffectReroll a number of dice up to the enhancement bonus of this staff. You must keep the new result even if it is lower, and you cannot reroll the same die more than once.

item.title: Staff of the Impregnable Mind
item.fluff: This adamantine staff protects you from mental attacks and, by channeling power into you, you can increase the protection it offers to include all attacks
item.headline: psychic

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 psychic.
Level 13 or 18Resist 10 psychic.
Level 23 or 28Resist 15 psychic.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy targets you with an attack against your Will
EffectUntil the start of the triggering enemy's next turn, you gain a +4 power bonus to Will.
Augment 2: You gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses instead.

item.title: Staff of Insightful Detection
item.fluff: Armed with this delicate staff, you can intuit secrets and perceive those who wish to remain hidden

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, enemies don't benefit from concealment or total concealment against your attacks using this staff.
Sustain MinorYou spend 1 power point, and the effect persists until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Staff of Knives
item.fluff: This steel-grey wooden staff transforms into s teel-hard wooden dagger on command

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus when used as a melee weapon

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectThe item transforms from staff into a dagger, or from dagger into a staff.
The item retains its enhancement in both forms, but does not count as a staff implement when in dagger form.

item.title: Staff of Psicraft
item.fluff: This crystal staff shapes psionic energy and reveals arcane secrets
item.headline: Item BonusArcana checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use a psionic power that has a burst or wave area of effect
EffectThe size of the triggering burst or wave increases by 1.
2You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

item.title: Staff of Resilience
item.fluff: This black ash staff can absorb some of your life force and turn it into a protective aura

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou spend a healing surge to gain temporary hit points equal to twice your healing surge value. These temporary hit points last until the end of the encounter.

item.title: Staff of Ruin
item.fluff: This gnarled, jagged staff fits the hand of any spellcaster seeking to devastate his or her opponent

item.title: Staff of the Serpent
item.fluff: Shaped like a rigid combra, this bronze staff enables you to wield poison as a deadly weapon
item.headline: poison

block.name: Property
block.line: Ane melee attack made with this staff deals an extra +1d4 poison damage.
Level 12 or 17Extra +2d4 poison damage.
Level 22 or 27Extra +3d4 poison damage.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou deal poison damage to a creature with a Poison attack using this staff

EffectThe triggering creature takes ongoing poison damage (save ends). The ongoing poison damage equals 3 + twice times this staff's enhancement bonus. If the triggering attack already deals ongoing poison damage, you instead increase that ongoing poison damage by this staff's enhancement bonus if that would deal more ongoing poison damage.

item.title: Staff of Spatial Contortion
item.fluff: The crystal atop this staff refracts your spell's energy, scattering it in different directions

headline.condition: when you use this staff's power

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use a close wave power using this implement; the power must be at least a close wave 3
EffectThe triggering power becomes a close burst with a size two smaller than the wave. For example, a close wave 4 becomes a close burst 2.

item.title: Staff of Storms
item.fluff: This staff, covered in lightning runes, enhances the power of lightning and thunder spells
item.headline: lightning or thunder

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou use a Lightning or Thunder power
EffectClose wave 3 (each creature in the wave); Each target takes 1d6 lightning and thunder damage.
Level 15 or 202d6 lightning and thunder damage.
Level 25 or 303d6 lightning and thunder damage.

item.title: Staff of Striking
item.fluff: Fashioned of unadorned metal in a symmetrical and severe design, this staff delivers forceful blows to your enemeis
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus on melee attacks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature adjacent to you with an Implement or Weapon attack using this staff
EffectThe triggering attack deals additional damage to the triggering creature equal to this staff's enhancement bonus, pushes it up to 1 square, and knocks it prone.
Level 24 or 29Push up to 2 squares.

item.title: Staff of the Traveler
item.fluff: This ruddy staff looks as if it has seen many lands and many times, and it offers you the same opportunitities for travel

block.name: Critical
block.line: you can teleport the target up to a number of squares equal to twice this staff's enhancement bonus. For every two squares you choose not to teleport the target, you deal it +1d6 critical damage.

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you would shift on your turn, you can instead teleport the same distance.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou teleport at least 2 squares
EffectYou teleport up to half the distance of the triggering teleport.

item.title: Staff of Ultimate Defense
item.fluff: This sturdy wooden staff may not be the favored implement of war wizards, yet many find the safety it offers desirable

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use the staff of defense Arcane Implement Mastery power, you add the enhancement bonus of this staff to the bonus granted by that power.

item.title: Staff of Unfailing Talent
item.fluff: This staff resonates with psychic energy as long as it remains in contact with you while you have a reserve of psionic energy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 psychic damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you have at least 1 power point remaining

item.title: Staff of Verdant Growth
item.fluff: This gnarled wooden staff grows leafy tendrils along its length when activated

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou use a primal area or close power
EffectAll creatures in the area of effect of the triggering power are slowed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Staff of the War Mage
item.fluff: This staff, topped with a red crystal, enhances the size of your wave and burst spells

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use a power that has a burst or wave area of effect
EffectThe size of the triggering burst or wave increases by 1.

item.title: Staff of Winter
item.fluff: This staff is engraved with winter symbols and is cold to the touch, and it adds to the effect of your cold spells
item.headline: Critical+1d6 cold damage per plus
Cold

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with a Cold attack using this staff
EffectEach enemy within 2 squares of you is immobilized (save ends).
Level 14 or 19Within 3 squares.
Level 24 or 29Each enemy within 3 squares.

item.title: Staff of Withering
item.fluff: This staff appears to be little more than a rotting tree branch, but one touch of it saps the strength from any foe

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with an attack using this staff
EffectThe triggering creature is weakened (save ends).

item.title: Summer Growth Totem
item.fluff: Summber brings growth, and the primal energy channeled through this totem helps spawn vines that hinder your foes

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 5; The burst creates a zone of hindering vines until the end of your next turn.
The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies.

item.title: Summoner's Staff
item.fluff: This hawthorn staff is engraved with the images of dozens of different creatures

headline.condition: with attacks made by your summoned creatures

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever an enemy makes an attack and misses a creature summoned by you, choose either yourself, or one ally within 5 squares of that summoned creature.
After the triggering attack is resolved, the chosen creature gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + twice this staff's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Summoner's Tome
item.fluff: Outlines of creatures are burned into the cured-hide cover of this book, which holds many summoning secrets

block.name: Property
block.line: Your summoned creatures can make reactive strikes, even if they normally do not have that ability, though they must have an at-will melee attack to use. If the attack normally targets more than one creature, it can only target the creature that triggered the reactive strike.

item.title: Sunfury Implement
item.fluff: Constantly warm to the touch, this implement depicts the blazing sun
item.headline: fire and radiant
Fire or Radiant

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this implement
EffectThe triggering enemy is bathed in burning light (save ends).
While bathed, the enemy is blinded and takes ongoing fire and radiant damage. The ongoing damage equals 3 + twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Symbol of Astral Might
item.fluff: This symbol is a potent tool against creatures from the Elemental Chaos

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit or miss an elemental creature with an Implement attack using this holy symbol

EffectThe triggering power deals +1d10 additional damage to elemental creatures. If the triggering attack deals reduced damage instead of half damage on a miss, an elemental creature still takes half of this additional damage.
Level 14 or 19+2d10 additional damage.
Level 24 or 29+3d10 additional damage.

item.title: Symbol of the Channeler
item.fluff: Whispering a prayer to your deity while holding this symbol lets you channel more power

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou can use an additional Channel Divinity power during this encounter. You do not regain any expended Channel Divinity power.
Level 17, 22, 27You regain any expended Channel Divinity powers.

item.title: Symbol of Civilization
item.fluff: This coin-like symbol glimmers even though no light shines upon its surface

headline.condition: if you worship a deity of the Civilization domain

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou must worship a deity of the Civilization domain.
TriggerAn ally you can see scores a critical hit
EffectThe triggering ally can choose to hit normally to spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

item.title: Symbol of Confrontation
item.fluff: This holy symbol enhances the power of your divine challenge

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and +1d8 damage per plus against an enemy marked by you

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with an attack using this holy symbol
EffectYou count as having engaged the target of your divine challenge class power during this turn.

item.title: Symbol of Daring
item.fluff: When you wield this symbol, your allies are inspired to strike boldly

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this implement and the attack was made during an extra action gained by spending an action point, you deal an additional +1d6 critical damage per plus, and all critical damage is radiant damage.

block.name: Property
block.line: When an ally within 5 squares of you makes an attack during an extra action gained by spending an action point, he or she gains a power bonus to damage rolls for that attack. The power bonus equals this holy symbol's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Symbol of Delayed Fate
item.fluff: This symbol, shaped like a double-headed coin, lets you elude fate for a split moment

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou fail your first saving throw against an effect
EffectThe triggering effect does not affect you until the end of your next turn.
If the triggering effect would change or has additional effects for a failed save, you do not count as having failed the save.

item.title: Symbol of Divine Force
item.fluff: Through this symbol, you batter foes with relentless conviction

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with a divine power using this holy symbol, you push the target 1 square.
Level 12 or 17Push 2 squares.
Level 22 or 27Push 3 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an an enemy with a divine power using this holy symbol
EffectYou push the triggering enemy a number of squares equal to this holy symbol's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Symbol of Divine Reach
item.fluff: This symbol lets you extend the reach against your enemies

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d4 damage per plus, or +1d6 damage per plus with divine area attacks, or +1d8 damage per plus with divine ranged attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a divine ranged or divine area power with this holy symbol, you can add the symbol's enhancement bonus to the range.
For example, a +3 symbol of divine reach would increase an "area burst 1 within 5 squares" to an "area burst 1 within 8 squares", a "ranged 5/10" to "ranged 8/13", and so on.

item.title: Symbol of Dragon Defense
item.fluff: This symbol shields you from dragons' attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy attacks ally within 5 squares of you, and the attack has the Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder keyword
EffectClose burst 5 (the triggering ally); The target gains resist 5 against the triggering keyword or keywords until the end of the encounter.
Level 13 or 18Resist 10.
Level 23 or 28Resist 15.

item.title: Symbol of Excellence
item.fluff: Your devotion to your divine patron inspires others to attain the heights of excellence

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectClose burst 10 (one ally in burst); The target gains a power bonus to one attack rolls, ability check, or skill of his or her choice before the end of the encounter. The power bonus equals the enchancement bonus of this holy symbol.

item.title: Symbol of the First Spirits
item.fluff: An oath of dedication to the natural spirits of the world is incribed in fine script upon this wooden holy symbol

block.name: Property
block.line: A character that has proficiency with totem implements can treat this holy symbol as a totem instead of holy symbol.

item.title: Symbol of Foe Turning
item.fluff: Through this symbol, you can punish specific enemies of your faith as well as vile undead

block.name: Creation
block.line: When this holy symbol is created, the creator chooses the angel, demon, devil, dragon, or giant creature type.

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use either the abjure undead or turn undead Channel Divinity attack using this holy symbol, you can choose to target the chosen creature type instead of undead.

item.title: Symbol of the Forge
item.fluff: The crossed hammer and tongs blaze white-hot as you channel your deity's wrath

block.name: Property
block.line: If you worship a deity of the creation domain, the first attack you hit with during an encounter using this symbol deals extra fire damage equal to twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee touch (one weapon); The first damage roll made using the target weapon before the end of your next turn gains a bonus equal to this symbol's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Symbol of Gajz
item.fluff: The runes that adorn this holy symbol allow your healing powers to grant resistance to your allies

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use your healing word class power or a Healing power using this holy symbol, choose one of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.
Each ally healed by the power gains resist 5 against the chosen damage type until the end of your next turn.
Level 12 or 17Resist 10.
Level 22 or 27Resist 15.
If the ally is a dragonborn or wearing one of the heirlooms of Mazgorax, increase the resistance by 5, or by 10 if the ally is a dragonborn wearing one of the heirlooms of Mazgorax.

item.title: Symbol of Good Fortune
item.fluff: Divine fortune favors you, bolstering your ability to strike accurately at your enemies

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with an attack using this holy symbol
EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to the first attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

item.title: Symbol of the Holy Nimbus
item.fluff: This symbol combines the images of sun and moon and, when you speak a word of healing, you and your allies are bathed in restoring light
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus

block.name: Critical
block.line: you or an ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

item.title: Symbol of Hope
item.fluff: The power of your faith makes it easier for allies to recover from debilitating effects

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this holy symbol
EffectChoose yourself or an ally within 5 squares of you. The chosen character can make a saving throw with a +5 power bonus against an effect that a save can end.

item.title: Symbol of Karmic Returns
item.fluff: This symbol glimmers with divine light as you deal retribution to a foe

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit using this holy symbol against an enemy that is marked by you and made an attack that did not include you as a target since the end of your previous turn, you deal an additional +1d6 critical damage per plus.

block.name: Property
block.line: When you make an attack using this holy symbol and the target is marked by you and made an attack that did not include you as a target since the end of your previous turn, you gain a +2 item bonus to your attack roll against that target.

item.title: Symbol of Life
item.fluff: The power of your faith adds energy to your healing prayers

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with Healing attacks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this holy symbol
EffectUntil the end of your current turn, any creature healed by an encounter or daily power you use regains an additional 1d6 hit points.
Level 12 or 17Additional 2d6 hit points.
Level 22 or 27Additional 3d6 hit points.

item.title: Symbol of Mortality
item.fluff: This symbol is a potent tool against undead and immortals
item.headline: Critical+1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against undead or immortal creatures

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit or miss an undead or immortal creature with an Implement attack using this holy symbol

EffectThe triggering power deals +1d8 additional damage to undead or immortal creatures. If the triggering attack deals reduced damage instead of half damage on a miss, an undead or immortal creature still takes half of this additional damage.
Level 14 or 19+2d8 additional damage.
Level 24 or 29+3d8 additional damage.

item.title: Symbol of Perseverance
item.fluff: This symbol glows with an inner light, preserving a fragment of your life force to bestow when an ally needs it most

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you score a critical hit with a Healing, Implement attack using this holy symbol, increase the healing by this holy symbol's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with an Implement attack using this holy symbol
EffectClose burst 20 (one dying ally); The target regains a number of hit points equal to his or her healing surge value + this holy symbol's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Symbol of Resilience
item.fluff: This symbol bolsters confidence and allows allies to shrug off even the deadliest effects

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with an Implement attack using this holy symbol

EffectClose burst 10 (you or one ally in burst); The target can make a saving throw against one effect a save can end. The target gains a power bonus to the saving throw equal to this holy symbol's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Symbol of Shielding
item.fluff: Your holy symbol glows as you conjure a nimbus of protection

headline.condition: with an attack that grants a bonus to defense or resistance to damage

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit with an Implement attack using this holy symbol
EffectClose burst 2 (you, or an ally in the burst); The target gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Symbol of the Sun
item.fluff: When you intone your prayers, argent fire erupts from this icon around your neck

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire and radiant damage per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with an attack using this holy symbol
EffectThe triggering enemy takes ongoing 5 fire and radiant damage (save ends).
Level 14 or 19Ongoing 10 damage.
Level 24 or 29Ongoing 15 damage.

item.title: Symbol of the Undead-hunter
item.fluff: Crafted from polished gold, this holy symbol intensifies and reflects light like a mirror
item.headline: Critical+1d6 radiant damage per plus
Item BonusDamage rolls against undead creatures

block.name: Property
block.line: When you pull, push, or slide an undead creature with an attack using this implement, you can increase the maximum distance by 1 square.
Level 14 or 19By 2 squares.
Level 24 or 29By 3 squares.

item.title: Symbol of Turning
item.fluff: Priests use this potent symbol to battle the udnead
item.headline: Critical+1d6 radiant damage per plus

block.name: Turn Undead
block.line: Channel DivinityThis counts as a Channel Divinity power for any abilities you might have, though it does not count against your use of one Channel Divinity power per encounter.
AttackClose burst 2 (each undead creature in the burst; Item's level +3 vs. Will
Level 14 or 19Close burst 3
Level 24 or 29Close burst 5
Hit2d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you push the target a number of squares up to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
Level 14 or 193d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Level 24 or 294d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
MissHalf damage, and pushed half the distance.

item.title: Tablet of Ad-Baraz
item.fluff: Etched onto this clay tablet is a list of names, the identities of those primordials defeated in a time now largely forgotten
item.headline: Arcana checks and History checks

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit one or more enemies with an arcane attack power using this tome
EffectEach enemy hit by the triggering power treats all squares as difficult terrain (save ends).

item.title: Thunder Wand
item.fluff: This sturdy wand enhances the destructive might of your thunder attacks
item.headline: Thunder

block.name: Thunderwave
block.line: AttackClose wave 3 (each creature in the wave); Intelligence vs. Fortitude
Hit1d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 23 or 282d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.
MissYou push the target half the distance.

item.title: Thunderfist Ki Focus
item.fluff: Rolling thunder booms with each strike you make, the metal of this focus vibrating as you assail your enemies with a cacophonous din
item.headline: thunder

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of the encounter, your attacks using this ki focus that deal untyped damage deal thunder damage instead. The attacks gain the Thunder keyword.
If an attack you make already has a damage type, the type is changed to thunder and the corresponding keyword is replaced with Thunder.
Using this power again ends the effect.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: RequirementThe at-will power of this ki focus must be active
TriggerYou hit or miss an enemy with a melee attack using this ki focus
EffectEach enemy adjacent to the triggering enemy takes thunder damage equal to 3 + twice this ki focus' enhancement bonus.
The at-will power's effect ends.

item.title: Tome of Arrest
item.fluff: This tome's cover is emblazoned with the symbol of a golden clenched fist
item.headline: force

block.name: Property
block.line: When you immobilize a target with a Wizard power using this tome, the power deals additional damage equal to this tome's enhancement bonus.
If the power does not normally deal damage, it deals damage equal to twice this tome's enhancement bonus instead.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an arcane Summoning power

EffectUntil the end of the encounter, the creature summoned by the triggering power can make a reactive strike when an enemy willingly moves out of a square adjacent to the summoned creature, but does not shift.

item.title: Tome of Forty Steps
item.fluff: Included within this curious tome are a number of arcane formulas for manipulating speed and time

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus on a summoned creature's attack

block.name: Property
block.line: Your summoned creatures gain a +1 item bonus to speed.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou use an arcane Summoning power
EffectOnce on each of your turns while the summoned creature remains, you can use a free action instead of a minor action to command the creature to move.

item.title: Tome of the North Wind
item.fluff: Covered in a thin patina of frost even in blazing heat, this tome unlocks secrets of ice magic

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use an arcane Cold power using this tome and the target is slowed, that target takes cold damage each time it moves while it remains slowed. The damage equals your Constitution modifier + this tome's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Tome of Replenishing Flame
item.fluff: This tome's copper biding is pleasantly warm to the touch

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use an arcane Fire power through this tome and that power can be sustained, you regain hit points each time you sustain it. The hit points regained are equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Tome of Striking Lightning
item.fluff: Sparks leap between the covers of this copper-bound tome
item.headline: lightning

block.name: Critical
block.line: When you make a Lightning attack using this tome, you can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

item.title: Totem of Ashen Fury
item.fluff: Using this totem stains your hands with soot, the remnants of a land ruined by defiling magic
item.headline: fire

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a primal Implement power using this totem
EffectYou create a zone of this ash and embers until the end of your next turn, in a close burst 1 using the triggering enemy as the origin.
Squares within the zone are heavily obscured, and any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes fire damage equal to 5 + twice this totem's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Totem of Thunder's Keeper
item.fluff: A stylized face carved into this totem animates with an angry growl to rebuff those who harm your allies

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy within 10 squares of you hits your spirit companion or an ally within 5 squares of you with a melee attack

EffectClose burst 10 (triggering enemy); The target takes thunder damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus, and you push it a number of squares equal to the totem's enhancement bonus.
Level 12 or 17Thunder damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus.
Level 22 or 27Thunder damage equal to 6 + your Wisdom modifier + this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Totem of Trailblazing
item.fluff: This simple stone has the faded image of a campsite painted upon it

item.title: Totem of Unleashed Flames
item.fluff: The edges of this bone totem are charred, hinting at the danger inherent in the centrally embedded red jaspes
item.headline: fire

block.name: Critical
block.line: the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Level 14 or 19Ongoing 15 fire damage.
Level 24 or 29Ongoing 20 fire damage.

block.name: Property
block.line: When you deal ongoing fire damage with a primal attack using this totem, the enemy takes a -2 penalty to saving throws to end the ongoing fire damage.

item.title: Totem of the Woodlands
item.flufff: This carved wooden totem lets you call forth the power of the forest to block and restrain your enemies

block.name: Critical
block.line: the target is slowed (save ends).

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a target with an Implement attack using this totem
EffectThe triggering target is restrained (save ends).

item.title: Utility Wand
item.fluff: A boon to practical spellcasters, this wand increases the range of one's utility spells

block.name: Property
block.line: Increase the range of your ranged arcane utility powers and the distance within which you can create the area of an area arcane utility power by a number of squares equal to this wand's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Verdant Staff
item.fluff: This writhing staff is composed of thin vines that constantly flourish and wither

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus when used with a primal power

block.name: Property
block.line: A primal character proficient with totem implements can use this staff as a totem implement.

item.title: Vicious Rod
item.fluff: This rod enhances the deadliness of your curse

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a creature under your curse

block.name: Property
block.line: When you deal your Warlock's Curse damage, you deal +1 damage for each die.

item.title: Wand of Allure
item.fluff: Charms cast through this twinkling golder wand reach the most distant foes

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use an arcane Charm power using this wand, the power's range increases by 2 squares.
Level 14 or 19By 4 squares.
Level 24 or 29By 6 squares.
This is included in the fast friends power of this wand.

block.name: Fast Friends
block.line: EffectBefore resolving the attack, choose yourself or an ally.
The target considers the chosen character to be its friend until the end of your next turn or until you or one of your allies attacks the target, whichever comes first.
AttackRanged 7 (one creature); Charisma vs. Will
HitThe target cannot attack the character it considers a friend.

MissWhile it considers the chosen character a friend, it takes a penalty to attack rolls against him or her and cannot make reactive strikes against him or her. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.

item.title: Wailing Tome
item.fluff: The hideous faces whose skin forms the binding for this book wail like tortured souls each time it is used

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a wizard Psychic or Teleportation power, you gain termporary hit points equal to 3 + twice this tome's enhancement bonus.

When you gain these temporary hit points, you can choose to become dazed until the end of your next turn. If you do, double the number of temporary hit points and add your [Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma] modifier to the total.

item.title: Wand of Fiery Horde
item.fluff: This red lacquer wand resembles a miniature totem pole of impish creatures

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 fire and psychic damage per plus

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls with the winged horde wizard at-will attack using this wand

block.name: Property
block.text: When you use the winged horde wizard at-will attack, it has the Fire keyword and deals fire and psychic damage.

block.name: Winged Horde
block.line: AttackArea burst 1 within 10 squares (each enemy in the burst); Intelligence vs. Will
Hit 1d6 fire and psychic damage, and the target cannot take immediate actions until the end of your next turn.
Level 23 or 282d6 fire and psychic damage.
EffectThe target cannot take opportunity actions until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Wand of Frost
item.fluff: Snow drifts to the ground in the wake of this wand's silvery ray, as it freezes the air it passes through before striking your enemy
item.headline: cold

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 cold.
Level 14 or 19Resist 10 cold.
Level 24 or 29Resist 15 cold.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectMelee 1 (one adjacent container, pool, or other body of water); The target water turns into solid ice, up to a number of contiguous squares equal to twice this wand's enhancement bonus. Affected squares are difficult terrain and remain frozen until the end of the encounter.
Only one square has to be adjacent to you, and a square containing any creatures cannot be frozen.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit a creature with a Cold power using this wand
EffectThe triggering creature is immobilized (save ends).

item.title: Wand of Inevitability
item.fluff: This wand, crafted from light, supple wood, allows you to accurately strike your enemies with a flick of the wrist

block.name: Property
block.line: If you miss every target of an at-will attack power made with this wand, you gain a +2 item bonus to all attack rolls with that power the first time you use it before the end of your next turn.
If you miss all targets when you have this bonus, the item bonus increases by a cumulative +1 and lasts until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Wand of Missile Mastery
item.fluff: This dark wooden staff empowers a wizard's most basic attack

block.name: Property
block.line: When use your magic missile attack power with this implement, you gain an item bonus to the damage equal to this implement's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou use your magic missile attack power
EffectYou can target one or two creatures with the triggering attack. No target can be more than 5 squares away from any other target.
Level 22 or 27Target one, two, or three creatures.

item.title: Wand of Radiance
item.fluff: A pinpoint of light dances on the tip of this wand
item.headline: Radiant

block.name: Dire Radiance
block.line: AttackRanged 10 (one creature); Charisma vs. Fortitude
Hit 1d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage.
If the target willingly moves nearer to you before the start of your next turn, it takes radiant damage equal to 2 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus.
Level 13 or 186 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus radiant damage.
Level 23 or 282d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and 10 + your Intelligence modifier + this wand's enhancement bonus radiant damage.
EffectThe first square of movement the target takes towards you before the start of your next turn costs an additional square.

item.title: Wand of Sleep and Charm
item.fluff: The crystal eye atop this dusky birch wand enhances spells that target the mind

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with arcane Charm or Sleep powers.
This increases to a +2 item bonus if the power deals no damage.

item.title: Wand of Unparalleled Reach
item.fluff: Arcane casters who keep to the outskirts of a battlefield favor this glass-topped wand
item.headline: Critical+1d4 damage per plus, or +1d6 damage per plus with arcane area attacks, or +1d8 damage per plus with arcane ranged attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use an arcane ranged or arcane area power with this wand, you can add the wand's enhancement bonus to the range.
For example, a +3 wand of unparalleled reach would increase an "area burst 1 within 5 squares" to an "area burst 1 within 8 squares", a "ranged 5/10" to "ranged 8/13", and so on.

item.title: Wrath of Nature Totem
item.fluff: This totem quivers with the pent-up forces of nature, waiting to be released when your wrath is unleashed

item.title: Watchful Spirit Totem
item.fluff: Several animal faces seem to look out from this totem with wide eyes, and the magic, channeled through your spirit companion, lashes out at those who harm your allies

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus against an enemy that has attacked your ally since the end of your previous turn

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: EffectUntil the end of your next turn, whenever an enemy deals damage to an ally adjacent to your spirit companion, that enemy takes damage equal to 3 + twice this implement's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Windsoul Ki Focus
item.fluff: This leather bag contains a dancing vortex of wind, which lends you its secrets

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: 1d4 damage per plus, and you push the target 1 square per plus

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: TriggerYou hit an enemy with a melee attack using this ki focus
EffectYou push the triggering enemy a number of squares equal to this ki focus's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Winterwood Totem
item.fluff: Fashioned from trees perpetually coated in primal frost, this totem is surrounded by a cloud of cold mist
item.headline: cold

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Triggeryou hit an enemy with a primal Cold power using this totem and deal damage to it
EffectThe triggering enemy gain vulnerable 3 cold until the end of your next turn.
Level 14 or 19Vulnerable 5 cold.
Level 24 or 29Vulnerable 8 cold.
